10 Proven Strategies to Find B2B Leads
======================================

Updated On: July 29, 2024

10 minutes read

![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/copy-link.svg)[![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/mail.svg)](mailto:?body=https://www.artisan.co/blog/how-to-find-b2b-leads)

![ 10 Proven Strategies to Find B2B Leads](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5Xph2T3YDFA5QIfZWhDdMB%2Fca3b50f1e4626928c90200a1193106d2%2FCover__3_.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Don’t worry, this isn’t _another_ generic intro about how “B2B leads are the lifeblood of any business” and “essential for sales success.” 

  

You already know that lead gen is important. Whether you’re a bootstrapped startup founder wearing multiple hats or a junior marketer at an international SaaS enterprise, your company’s very existence hinges on your ability to drive _consistent and high-quality_ leads. 

  

Lead gen will never be easy. But you can make it significantly less difficult by basing your strategy on the right mix of techniques and bolstering them with well-chosen tools.

  

If you’re new to B2B lead generation, this guide will help you build your system from the ground up. If you’re a seasoned pro, you’ll find tips and suggestions to further refine and develop your approach. 

  

Sound good? To quote perhaps the most overused ChatGPTism, let’s “dive” in. 

  

What Is B2B Lead Generation?
----------------------------

![Resarching Leads](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F7HNApk4KdUyLPeX8oXTir5%2F8c280ca79198503c491690a3fe8ecf80%2FResarching_Leads.webp&w=3840&q=75)

B2B lead generation is the process of identifying and engaging potential customers. Lead generation focuses on the initial awareness or “top of funnel” phase of the customer acquisition journey. 

  

There are several categories of leads. Marketing-qualified leads (MQLs) and sales-qualified leads (SQLs) are the most important. A marketing-qualified lead is a lead who has shown enough interest in your product or service—such as by responding to an ad or reaching out for more information—to be seen as having a reasonable likelihood of becoming a customer. 

  

At this stage, lead _generation_ ends and lead _nurturing_ begins. Lead nurturing is usually the responsibility of the sales team (although marketing teams may play a role alongside sales reps). A lead transitions from an MQL to an SQL when they have been through the nurturing process and are ready to buy. 

  

Lead generation is important because it’s the foundation of any successful sales funnel. It’s directly tied to baseline metrics like revenue, growth and profitability. B2B companies with effective lead generation strategies generate [133% more revenue](https://intellistart.co.uk/what-is-lead-generation-and-why-is-it-important/)
 compared to “average” companies that don’t fully engage potential buyers.

  

How to Find B2B Leads That Boost Your Business
----------------------------------------------

Without further ado, let’s look at the strategies themselves. Keep in mind that the idea isn’t to apply everything blindly. Rather, you should find the right _mix_ for your target audience and product. 

  

### 1\. Find B2B Leads via LinkedIn Sales Navigator 

LinkedIn has one of the most complete, most accurate B2B lead databases. [89% of B2B marketers](https://sproutsocial.com/insights/linkedin-statistics/)
 use LinkedIn for lead generation, and 62% say its effective over the long term.

  
![Resarching Leads-1](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F2EosHwTyHHy77922dquhWw%2Fffbe25a3678b9597ab029d5df6be6230%2FResarching_Leads-1.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Here’s how to generate leads with LinkedIn Sales Navigator. 

  

1.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Purchase a paid LinkedIn plan if you don’t already have one. 
    
      
    
2.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Use advanced search filters to target specific industries, company sizes, job titles, etc. based on your ideal customer profile (ICP). 
    
      
    
3.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Use LinkedIn's InMail feature to reach out directly to B2B prospects and decision-makers with a personalized message that clearly outlines your value proposition. 
    
      
    
4.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Follow up, again keeping everything personalized. 
    
      
    

  

Here’s a sample template based on the three Cs (compliment, case study, call to action) of successful outreach: 

  

_Hi {prospect name},_

  

_Love what you’re doing at {prospect company name}. I was particularly impressed by your {recent prospect company achievement)._ 

  

_At {your company name}, we provide {your service}. We recently helped one of our clients achieve {client result)._ 

  

_We’d love to do the same for you. Are you free for a quick call this week?_ 

  

And here’s what an example looks like in practice with Microsoft as an example:

  

_Hi Bill,_

  

_Love what you’re doing at Microsoft. I was particularly impressed by your latest VR headset release._ 

  

_At Artisan, we provide fully automated, AI-driven lead gen. We recently helped one of our clients triple their VR sales._ 

  

_We’d love to do the same for you. Are you free for a quick call this week?_ 

  

### 2\. Start a Customer Referral Program

Research shows that referral programs are among the most effective low-cost lead-gen strategies, with [86% of companies](https://viral-loops.com/referral-marketing/statistics)
 that use referral programs experiencing growth. 

  

If you don’t already have a referral program, you’re potentially missing out on Everest-size mountains of inexpensive leads. 

  

Here’s how to launch a referral program:

  

1.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Decide on an attractive referral incentive.** Incentivize existing customers to refer new leads by offering discounts, rewards, or bonuses. Offer an incentive to _both_ the referrer and the recipient. 
    
      
    
2.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Build referral infrastructure.** Create referral program landing pages and track referrals through your CRM. While there’s significant variability between industries, data shows that a referral rate (the percentage of your total sales that come from referrals) of [around 10%](https://www.alexanderjarvis.com/what-is-referral-rate-what-is-the-formula-and-why-it-is-important/)
     is healthy. 
    
      
    
3.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Contact existing customers.** Foster strong relationships with customers to encourage advocacy and referrals. Include referral emails in your email onboarding sequences and newsletter broadcasts.
    
      
    
4.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Test and refine.** You’re unlikely to create a perfect referral program right off the bat, and that’s OK. Continuous A/B testing of your incentives, landing pages, and email outreach ensures ongoing improvement. 
    
      
    

![Referal](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4piiizGmNxKg2NVRNDaCjC%2Ffec690faa57c6620b576c550d287b7ef%2FReferal.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### 3\. Find and Reach Qualified Leads With AI Sales Tools

AI sales tools streamline the process of finding and reaching qualified leads through automated lead scoring, data enrichment, personalized outreach, and hands-off optimization. 

  

AI sales tools also allow salespeople to focus on high-value activities like pursuing the most promising potential leads, which is the key to improving conversion rates and, ultimately, revenue.

  

Let’s take the example of [Artisan](https://www.artisan.co/)
, an advanced lead-gen AI tool, to see how you would prospect in this way:

  

1.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Define your ICPs in detail to lay the basis for personalization and segmentation. 
    
      
    
2.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Create outreach templates, allowing AI to add a high level of lead personalization. 
    
      
    
3.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Let Artisan consult its lead database of over 300 million leads to put together a highly relevant list of targets. 
    
      
    
4.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Use AI-based insights to improve your response and conversion rates with ongoing outreach optimization and lead scoring.
    
      
    

  

Tools like Artisan are powerful for two main reasons. 

  

First, they allow for a largely hands-off approach, with AI taking over many manual tasks such as outreach personalization and lead filtering. 

  

Second, they are excellent for scaling. The size of Artisan’s database and the unlimited capacity of its AI engine means you can ramp up your lead gen in a fraction of the time it might otherwise take. 

  
![AI Help](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F2ijTJTlQ9N3n4AVK7P9yhH%2F4d705d21ef00d41a2ecd4ca51b4f3415%2FAI_Help.webp&w=3840&q=75)

**Ready to find perfect-fit B2B leads on autopilot?** Supercharge your sales with Ava, Artisan’s AI business development representative. Experience fully automated, intelligent outreach that fills your pipeline quicker than you can say “lead gen!”  [Get in touch now](https://www.artisan.co/talk-to-sales?page_source=/pricing)
. 

  

### 4\. Engage Prospects Through Social Media

LinkedIn is the [top platform for B2B](https://www.statista.com/statistics/1445198/leading-social-media-platforms-used-for-b2b-marketing/)
 marketing, with YouTube coming in second. Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter are also powerful, pointing towards the need for an omnichannel approach. 

  
![Statista](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5YzwSs7UVhAJ1hhkwkiAUw%2F50461313092b8e3fb0ff41d23bbc91f0%2FStatista.png&w=3840&q=75)

Here’s how to create content that hits those all-important engagement buttons:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Understand the platform:** The type of longer-form written content that works on LinkedIn isn’t going to fly with Instagram audiences familiar with snappy video shorts. Platform-specific expertise is a must for your marketing team. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Focus on value:** Social media users are savvy. Always keep the question, “Where can I provide value?” at the forefront of your mind. Thought-leadership insights, original studies, and news commentary are all good contenders for content. Think in terms of your customers’ pain points. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Connect with influencers:** Share and share alike. Connect with and redistribute the content of other influencers, widening your audience and opening the door to potential collabs. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Use hashtags:** Yes, hashtags are still valuable. Use them appropriately and they can give your content a small lift. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Engage:** There’s nothing that screams, “I don’t care,” than a comments section without any replies from the poster. Show your audience you value them by responding to their comments and shares. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Don’t be scared to sell:** Being _over_ salesy is one of the surest ways to alienate your audience. But there’s a risk of going too far in the opposite direction, too. Around one in every five posts can include a call to action. 
    
      
    

### 5\. Consider Using Web Scraping Tools to Find Qualified Leads

Web scraping has become something of a dirty phrase in digital marketing. This is perhaps understandable because of how open to all sorts of evil spammery it is.

  

However, scraping can be done ethically, safely, and legally. Artisan, which collects data that’s shared with consent, is one example of a company operating ethically in this space. 

  

Here are four tips to conduct web scraping safely: 

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Use tools like [Artisan](http://artisan.co)
    , Octoparse, Import.io, and ParseHub to extract contact information from websites. You don’t need any technical expertise to do this. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and ethical guidelines when scraping data. For example, GDPR applies in the EU. Generally speaking, third-party providers will take care of regulatory responsibilities. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Clean and verify scraped data to maintain accuracy and relevance. Ensuring the accuracy of data can have a significant effect on your outreach delivery rate. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Test the effectiveness of different databases. Not all databases are equal and there can be significant differences in lead quality and accuracy. Some databases are better suited to specific industries. 
    
      
    

![Web Scrapping](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5MbZzNWRrmq4ugFzoGFxRc%2F492040183ca55e4a321565dc11fadfc9%2FWeb_Scrapping.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### 6\. Leverage SEO-Focused Content Marketing to Attract Leads 

Companies with blogs produce an average of [67% more leads per month](https://www.demandmetric.com/content/content-marketing-infographic)
 than companies that don’t have active blogs. 

  

In addition, well-executed SEO strategies can drive an [ROI of up to 1000%](https://sagapixel.com/seo/seo-roi-statistics/)
. Not bad by any stretch of the imagination.

  

Here’s how to make SEO-based content marketing work for you:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Diversify your strategy:** Create high-quality, informative content in a range of formats. Short blog posts, long pillar articles, case studies, ebooks, and whitepapers all have a place. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Target “sweet spot” KWs:** While it’s important not to overestimate the competitiveness of the keywords you can rank for, going for the easiest option isn’t always best, either. Find the sweet spot KWs you can rank for given your domain’s authority. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Put quality first:** EEAT has become one of the most well-known Google acronyms among content marketers. It stands for Experience, Expertise, Authority and Trust. Prioritize these factors when creating content. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Take care of technical SEO:** Keyword density, featured snippets, content length, meta descriptions, internal links—all are important for rankings. Content quality is vital. But don’t overlook the technicalities. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Tailor your CTA to the relevant stage of your funnel:** A page with high buyer intent, like “Best lawyer to get me out of prison now”, should push visitors to book a call or buy a service immediately. Pages with lower buyer intent, such as “What's the difference between a divorce and criminal lawyer,” should have a softer call to action, such as the opportunity to download a free guide in exchange for an email. 
    
      
    

### 7\. Generate Leads by Re-Engaging Your Email List

Your email list likely contains at least some unengaged subscribers. These are potential customers, and it often doesn’t take much to reconnect. 

  

So, how can you turn uninterested subscribers into sizzling hot leads? Enter the re-engagement campaign…

  
![Follow Up](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1vxRwnunFTzV3KgCjihdGs%2F97b023a1a3e48eb062c9f0ef0f5d20d4%2FFollow_Up.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Here’s a quick five-step process for re-engaging inactive subscribers: 

  

1.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Segment your inactive B2B subscribers where possible, such as by age, location, or sign-up date.
    
      
    
2.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Send them a tailored offer such as a voucher or free gift.
    
      
    
3.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Automate follow-up reminder emails.
    
      
    
4.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Nurture the leads who have shown initial interest with further personalized emails and offers. 
    
      
    
5.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Use a clear call to action prompting them to trial your product or book a call with the sales team. 
    
      
    

### 8\. Use Cold Outreach to Find New B2B Leads

Does the thought of _cold_ outreach send a shiver down your spine? If you’re put off by the idea, you’re not alone. 

  

However, cold outreach, especially email, works. Studies show that the [average response rate of around 17%](https://woodpecker.co/blog/cold-email-statistics/)
 for personalized emails of the kind Artisan provides is . 

  

Here are some key tips to help you get the most out of cold outreach: 

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Take a multi-channel approach:** The best approaches leverage multiple channels, with email outreach, social media outreach, and cold calling all accounted for.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Automate wherever possible:** Cold outreach requires scale. As such, AI and automation tools can help to enhance efficiency by scheduling and automating email sequences and crafting personalized messages based on prospect data and behavior.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Personalize, personalize, personalize:** Personalization is crucial. You don’t need to hand-write every message with a fountain pen. A good template with ample space for your automation tool to add individual elements is more than enough.
    
      
    

![Email List](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1AEpLDGyLZs8axCXVU5XtX%2Fda76da7e662606c1715dccf18795f310%2FEmail_List.webp&w=3840&q=75)

A tool like Artisan is perfect for cold email automation. The AI functionality, unmatched by any competitors, allows for a level of personalization much greater than traditional if-then automations. 

  

### 9\. Host Webinars for B2B Sales Leads

Webinars have mahoosive (that’s the technical term) conversion rates, and they’re excellent for turning cold leads into hot ones. In fact, [73% of B2B marketers](https://www.hubilo.com/blog/webinar-benchmarks)
 say that webinars are their “most effective” lead gen strategy. 

  

Here are some tips for hosting next-level webinars:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Ask your existing audience, which is likely a sample of your broader market, what webinar topics they’re interested in. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Always collect registration data to follow up with attendees afterward.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Include a clear call to action at the end of webinars, whether to sign up to your service or book a sales call. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Make webinars available for a period after they’ve ended to overcome timezone constraints. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Repurpose webinar content into other formats like blog posts and infographics to extend reach.
    
      
    

  

Some marketers worry that webinars represent a complex technical challenge. A few years ago, this might have been true. However, with the prevalence of easy-to-use webinar software, this is no longer the case. 

  

### 10\. Optimize Website Landing Pages to Increase B2B Leads

When does a website visitor become a lead? 

  

We’re sure there are lots of technical business-school answers to this question. But we prefer a simpler working definition: a visitor becomes a lead when they pass on their contact details. 

  

Here are three tips for using landing pages to turn visitors into leads:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Create dedicated landing pages for specific marketing campaigns and ads targeting B2B leads (there’s nothing worse than a landing page totally out of sync with an advert). 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    A/B test landing page elements such as headlines, CTAs, and forms to improve conversion rates _on an ongoing basis_. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Use analytics tools to identify and replicate your best landing pages and associated offers.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Ensure that technical on-site elements like your page structure and navigation are easy to use. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Always include a clear, straightforward CTA on your landing pages, whether a download link for a lead magnet or the option to book a sales call. 
    
      
    

Best Tools to Supplement Your B2B Lead Generation Strategies
------------------------------------------------------------

Once you’ve got an ironclad marketing strategy, you need tools to help you execute. 

  

Most marketers rely on an integrated tech stack rather than a single tool. That said, the trend in recent years has been towards multifunctional all-in-one platforms rather than narrow “point” solutions. While you’ll have additional tools for supporting tasks, most of your sales prospecting will likely take place in a single app. 

  

We recommend that you try the different solutions on offer to get a sense of which one best fits your business. 

  

Here’s a quick overview of the top lead generation tools to get you started: 

  

### 1\. [Artisan](https://www.artisan.co/sales-ai)

![Artisan Homepage Screenshot](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3iMLW1oB3n7XEZwVilgwp7%2F5dde3325aea1873626267f74024f3ae2%2FScreenshot__686_.png&w=3840&q=75)

Artisan is an all-in-one outbound sales and lead generation platform that puts AI at the core of its functionality. Artisan’s personal assistant, Ava, builds personalized campaigns and populates them with leads from the 300 million-strong database. It uses the latest AI capabilities to _intelligently_ automate all aspects of lead filtering, outreach, and optimization. 

  

#### Features

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Database of 300 million B2B contacts (including technographic data, e-commerce data, and more)
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Automated campaign creation and management
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    A proprietary waterfall that selects optimal personalization for each lead by scanning multiple data sourcesIntelligent personalization
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Email warmup and deliverability enhancement
    
      
    

#### Price

Artisan has a custom pricing model to ensure customers get the best possible value. [Contact a sales representative](https://www.artisan.co/talk-to-sales)
 to get a personalized quote.

  

**Supercharge your sales with Ava, Artisan’s AI BDR.** Experience fully automated, intelligent outreach that fills your pipeline quicker than you can say “lead gen!” [Get in touch now](https://www.artisan.co/talk-to-sales)
 and see the power of AI-driven outreach for yourself. 

  

### 2\. Lemlist

![lemlist](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F283X7tPjZnLJYt8erfwRHt%2F675f6379695f1cf5f77fdeb0f5a5168c%2FScreenshot_2024-07-24_at_3.34.57_PM.png&w=3840&q=75)

Lemlist is a well-known cold email outreach tool offering comprehensive features for building lead target lists, automating email marketing outreach, and following up with interested leads. 

  

#### Features

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Lead database
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Email automation
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Email warmup
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    AI support for sequences
    
      
    

#### Price

Lemlist offers a range of plans. Plans are priced between $39/month per user and $159/month per user. 

  

### 3\. Hunter.io

![Hunter](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5Z4JabrLAXzZGoZNPOOGDz%2F46a0bb8850bd0b7ae82193b1655d066d%2FScreenshot__693_.png&w=3840&q=75)

Hunter.io is perhaps best known as an email search engine. The platform now includes email automation and outreach tools and is well-suited to smaller B2B businesses. 

  

#### Features

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Leads database (with limited monthly searches)
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Campaign management
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Integrations with third-party tools
    
      
    

#### Price

The Starter plan is $49/month, and the Business plan is $499/month. A limited free plan is available. 

  

### 4\. Snov.io

![snov](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2FOPv5JF8OsUJSRWpxONMS9%2Fde09c661efab394f6a563134f3b88600%2FScreenshot_2024-07-24_at_3.35.17_PM.png&w=3840&q=75)

Snov.io is a sales enablement and outreach tool that emphasizes automation. It has a large database of leads—though users have a set number of credits every month—and some AI support.

  

#### Features

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Lead database with monthly credit limits
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Automated outreach management
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    AI email writer
    
      
    

#### Price

Snov.io pricing is on a moving scale (starting at $30/month) based on the number of lead credits users want. A free trial is available. 

  
![Ending](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4Jtrdxo0dSYlr9lIKXgLIf%2Fef6aa31af7d57725c746b45906e44d95%2FEnding.webp&w=3840&q=75)

It’s Time to Say Goodbye…
-------------------------

If you’re not seeing the results you want from your lead gen efforts, don’t despair. Putting together a successful strategy takes time and a lot of trial and error. With perseverance, you’ll gradually build a consistent and scalable lead generation machine. 

  

If you _are_ already generating leads successfully, you can expect ever-improving results as you continue to test and refine. 

  

The value of automation and prospecting tools can’t be overstated. A platform like Artisan helps you at every stage of the lead gen and sales process, from finding contact details to sending personalized follow-ups. Even better, many routine tasks are automated, allowing you to focus on what’s most important. 

  

Now, it's time to start finding those hungry customers and filling your sales pipeline…

  

**Ready to supercharge your sales?** Experience fully automated, intelligent outreach that fills your pipeline quicker than you can say “lead gen!” [Get in touch now](https://www.artisan.co/talk-to-sales?page_source=/pricing)
 and see the power of AI-driven outreach for yourself.

What Is an AI SDR and How Do They Work?
=======================================

Updated On: July 29, 2024

10 minutes read

![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/copy-link.svg)[![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/mail.svg)](mailto:?body=https://www.artisan.co/blog/ai-sdr)

![What Is an AI SDR and How Do They Work?](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F77twxn147kbpRFXkGxjmuM%2F5dc2ef64bb5e3d71f31f9c96bf85e5a6%2FArtboard_16.webp&w=3840&q=75)

What if you could bring in thousands of more leads without expanding your SDR team? Well, you can.

  

AI SDRs are no longer a thing of the future—they're here and taking over the workflows that have slowed our sales teams for decades.

  

In this guide, we'll introduce you to AI SDRs and show you how to implement them into your workflows to generate more _qualified_ leads.

  

Understanding AI SDRs
---------------------

With only [17% of reps](https://www.techtarget.com/white-paper-ebook/how-does-your-sales-development-program-measure-up/)
 achieving 90% or higher of quota, AI SDRs are shifting from being a "nice to have" to becoming a major competitive advantage for sales teams.

  
![ai-vs-sdr](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3n63zl0JDoIZYZhizXnjhz%2Ffda06a35a9577c6ffaf9f4564064d117%2Fai-vs-sdr.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### What is an AI SDR?

An AI SDR, or AI sales development representative, is software that uses artificial intelligence to perform the tasks typically handled by a human SDR.

  

The use cases of AI SDRs in sales teams vary. You might entrust them with the entire prospecting process or have them handle specific manual tasks, freeing up your human SDRs to focus on things that matter most. How deeply you integrate AI SDRs in your workflows depends on your comfort with the technology and the sophistication of your tech stack.

  

Further down the article, we’ll give you all the information you need to choose the best approach for your business.

  

AI vs Human SDRs
----------------

When thinking about adding AI to your team, it's normal to ask, _"How does AI compare to human employees?"_ 

  

So, let's break it down and explore the differences and benefits of each.

  

#### AI SDRs

In many instances, AI SDRs outperform human agents:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Scalable processes.** Most SDR tasks like cold outreach, follow-ups, and lead scoring are repeatable. With a well-structured process in place, AI can take over these tasks and reach your SDR quota way faster.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Consistent messaging.** You don’t have to worry about your messages sounding off. Unlike humans, AI sticks to the script.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Automated optimization.** AI SDRs constantly evaluate their performance in the background and make adjustments on the fly. No need to spend hours poring over data.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Lower investment.** Scaling SDR with AI doesn’t come with payroll costs or extensive training programs.
    
      
    

**Ava is an AI SDR ready to take over your outbound prospecting.** [Discover](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 how she can accelerate your sales process.  

  

#### Human SDRs

Yet there are traits only inherent to human SDRs: 

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Decision-making in unscripted scenarios.** While AI can make decisions based on data input, only human SDRs can manage situations that deviate from the ordinary.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Ability to build personal connection and rapport with customers.** Humans can apply their personal traits and emotional intelligence to appeal to leads and create stronger connections with them. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Understanding of cultural nuances and subtle cues.** Human SDRs better handle ongoing conversations for their ability to spot and interpret cultural nuances and contextual cues.
    
      
    

**  
Who comes out on top in the AI SDR vs. human SDR debate?** While we'd love to offer a new angle, the answer remains the same: there's no competition between AI and humans to determine winners and losers. AI SDRs will scale your operations and remove the need to hire more SDRs, but you still need a human to move your qualified leads down the funnel.

  
![human-sdr](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4nNfy6sdMg4rRlby3o1YSK%2Fcdaeb42d3fbab06fe43e8d43915f6f89%2Fhuman-sdr.webp&w=3840&q=75)

4 Reasons to implement AI SDRs
------------------------------

In 2023, less than [5% of B2B sales activities](https://www.gartner.com/en/newsroom/press-releases/2023-09-21-gartner-expects-sixty-percent-of-seller-work-to-be-executed-by-generative-ai-technologies-within-five-years)
 were powered by generative AI technologies. By 2028, the number will reach 60%. Such a trend is easily explained by the numerous benefits of AI in sales, particularly in SDR.

  

### Automate and scale prospecting

Struggling to meet your monthly quota? It's no surprise—your human SDRs spend hours scouring databases, scraping the web for personalization insights, and crafting individualized messages, over and over again. Oh, and don’t forget about follow-ups… 

  

With AI SDRs, you can automate all these tasks so your human agents can focus solely on mapping out the process. 

  

**Ava has a database of 300M+ B2B prospects that she can instantly search to pinpoint your target customer personas.** She also automatically scrapes the web and social media pages to find insights that she uses to personalize the emails she writes. [Try Ava now.](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)

  

### Create a consistent experience for leads

Misspelling names, forgetting follow-ups, or having to change communication points—these can happen even to the best SDRs. _Do we even need to discuss how it impacts the lead experience?_

  

AI SDRs let you create a smooth experience for every contact, no matter what. They don’t have vacations or bad days—nothing slips through the cracks in AI-powered processes.

  

In Artisan, you can create a three-step email sequence that will be sent out every two days so you don’t have to worry about manual follow-ups. If the lead replies, Ava will stop the sequence.

  
![consistent-experience](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1wZULY7jP5FKlQyLKqDuti%2F16e60d88e18a408730f89696c87b0eb5%2Fconsistent-experience.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### Enhance your outreach with data-driven actions

AI is great at analyzing data—it can handle large amounts of information and find patterns that humans might miss.

  

Best of all, AI SDRs can use the data to act fast. For example, they can send a follow-up message when a user repeatedly visits your site or reach out to a prospect after they've posted a career update on LinkedIn.

  

### Let human SDRs focus on high-priority tasks

AI SDRs are primarily designed to free up your human agents for more critical responsibilities. If your human SDRs have been struggling to prioritize leads and connect with high-ticket prospects, now is the time to address it.

  

**Curious about what Ava can do for your sales team?** [Hire Ava now](https://artisan.co/ava-sales-rep/)
 to experience how AI can accelerate your outbound cycle. She can automate over 80% of manual tasks!

  

The Top 5 AI SDRs
-----------------

Before we dive deeper into the specific applications of AI SDRs in the sales process, let's take a look at the technology that makes it all possible _(and prove we aren’t talking science fiction)_.

  

### 1\. Artisan

![artisan](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1XONz1oRXCge0sx8pGGbwf%2F9c6d17d69fad8b536b5112815549508b%2Fartisan.webp&w=3840&q=75)

At Artisan, we’ve developed an [AI SDR Ava](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 to help businesses automate over 80% of the outbound demand generation process.

  

**What Ava does:**

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Communicates with your sales team through a chat interface
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Understands your ideal customer profile (ICP) based on your product description, target audience, and their pain points
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Prospects leads by scraping over 300M contacts in 200 countries across B2B partners’ databases
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Enriches leads with third party sources like CrunchBase and web scraping their Twitter, LinkedIn and website
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Writes hyper-personalized outreach to leads following different cold email strategies with AI Sales Playbooks 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Uses AI-powered automation to follow up with leads
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Manages deliverability with email warmup, dynamic send limits, and many other tools
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Integrates with HubSpot, Salesforce, and other systems
    
      
    

  
With Ava, you have full control over your brand voice without having to micromanage it. You can choose one of the [AI Sales Playbooks](https://www.artisan.co/products/sales-playbooks)
 to determine how Ava will approach your leads. 

  
![playbook](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F37Rgod1zduhkac1a248BKM%2Fd2d31c174fc4b0bbbdc78179a4ec38b0%2Fplaybook.webp&w=3840&q=75)

_All in all, nothing speaks better than customers’ success stories, right?_ Medical contract research organization (CRO) [bioaccess](https://www.bioaccessla.com/)
 entrusted Ava with business development. In just two months, Julio Martinez-Clark, CEO of bioaccess, reports outstanding results:

  

_“I have been using Ava for about two months. I have had a consistent +3% response rate and four sales calls leading to potential sales. Ava simplifies my company’s business development process and fills my calendar with sales calls. This is precisely what I wanted. I wouldn’t trade Ava for anything else in the market!”_

  

Julio Martinez-Clark, CEO of [bioaccess](https://www.bioaccessla.com/)

  

**Ready to hit your SDR quota?** [Let Ava](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 **automate your outbound workflows and free up your SDRs for more important tasks.** 

  

### 2\. AiSDR

![aisdr](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3MGfHjzWJxyj0MGldZ2eYc%2F03955716ab30939893ee47b3d4d60734%2Faisdr.webp&w=3840&q=75)

AiSDR provides AI bots for sales development, focusing on crafting realistic AI emails. 

  

Similar to Ava, AiSDR scrapes a vast lead database and initiates conversations with leads that match your ICP. The system analyzes leads' latest LinkedIn activity and uses the data to personalize cold pitches.

  

Users have noted that AiSDR lacks integrations with essential business software such as Salesforce. If integration capabilities are critical for you, consider alternative options from our list.

  

### 3\. 11x

![11x](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3pvK5G1Oe6U2PL6WmuLoUa%2Fa5c1cc27d258af1d136436cc6580e4c3%2F11x.webp&w=3840&q=75)

On a mission to empower teams with AI workers, 11x has recently introduced Alice, an AI-powered SDR.

  

Alice identifies potential buyers, researches relevant lead data, and engages them with personalized messages - but you are not able to communicate with Alice. Users have reported issues with bugs on the platform leading to emails being generated in the wrong language.

  

### 4\. Relevance.ai

![relevance-ai](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F6Rw6nVaWCN1ZJ4iZYI8C5Z%2F6f80b7bc748694573a3930fce3de8ee4%2Frelevance-ai.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Meet Bosh, the AI SDR from Relevance.ai.

  

Bosh offers flexibility and integration options. You can deeply integrate it into your workflows, going beyond outbound and prospecting tasks, but the company does not specialize in creating AI SDRs, hence it is less of a focus for them.

  

Of course, this flexibility comes with a trade-off. Setting up the agent involves extensive training, configuring, and testing the bot.

  

### Integrating AI SDR with existing sales workflows

_“Okay, that sounds good in theory. How do I fit them into my workflows?”_

  

Well, the answer depends on what your existing workflows look like and to what extent you want to automate them with AI SDRs. But regardless of the specifics, your AI SDR integration starts here:

  

#### CRM integration

So you’re managing your sales process through a CRM system. You can integrate your AI SDRs with it to track your interaction with prospects across all channels in one place.

  
![crm-integration](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F9wmbmcGzEM2Fu2TlaaG2I%2Fb996520f25ac3cc44972dd3b602447b5%2Fcrm-integration.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Ava, for instance, integrates seamlessly with HubSpot and Salesforce, allowing sales teams to: 

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Prevent outreach to existing customers and prospects
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Export all lead data to a centralized system
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Build a pipeline with highly qualified leads
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Reach out to existing prospects that have gone cold
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Build custom sales workflows powered by GenAI 
    
      
    

  
You can start by using your AI SDR to find and nurture qualified leads, then send them to your CRM system's pipeline for further processing.

  

#### Unified communication channels

Even if you entrust your prospecting process to AI SDRs, you’ll want to stay updated on those conversations. By integrating them into your company’s unified communications, you’ll keep everyone involved updated on the prospecting process and lead updates.

  

Ava integrates with Slack, so you don’t have to keep logging into Artisan for updates. All notifications will appear in a dedicated channel you can share with specific team members.

  
![unified-communication](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2FoSQ8YxGKZLRiMPmmD5xxK%2F4a3aa5c2844ada24a71bb7cfcc47a502%2Funified-communication.webp&w=3840&q=75)

#### Automated task assignment

Depending on how deeply you integrate AI into your sales workflows, you’ll want to interfere at different stages. 

  

If you’re just starting out, you may want to approve all of your AI SDR’s actions before it proceeds. As you gain confidence in the system, you might only need to intervene when a user responds to the AI outreach or even later in the process. 

  

This is where you need to integrate your AI SDRs with your task management software—so you don’t have to manually review every step in the AI workflow and _inevitably_ miss crucial moments for intervention. 

  

Whether you use ClickUp, Monday, or manage your team’s tasks directly in your CRM system, Ava will soon be able to seamlessly integrate with any platform through Zapier. Simply set trigger events and let automation update your team’s to-do list.

  

**Want to try Ava for yourself?** [Hire Ava now](https://artisan.co/ava-sales-rep/)
, and she’ll execute successful outbound strategies to boost your conversion rates. Get more meetings booked into your calendar instantly.

  

AI SDR in lead generation
-------------------------

Lead generation is typically the most repetitive and automatable task in SDR—perfect for being offloaded to AI. 

  

Here’s how AI SDRs enhance lead generation:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **More accurate lead qualification.** In 2023, [41% of sales pros](https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/ai-sales-prospecting)
     were already using AI tools to qualify leads. Considering the rapid adoption of AI, these numbers have likely skyrocketed since then. Clearly, AI SDRs will soon be indispensable to the lead qualification process.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Personalized outreach at scale.** When you have 200 pre-qualified leads in your pipeline, spending just two minutes to personalize each message would take almost seven hours of work. AI SDRs can do it faster and without errors. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **24/7 operation.** AI SDRs don’t sleep, take breaks, or go on vacation. They can work around the clock, making contact with leads at the best times, regardless of the time zone.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Lead enrichment.** Keeping lead profiles updated is hard. AI SDRs like [Artisan’s Ava](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
     continuously scrape web and third-party data to update your leads' profiles with relevant information, ensuring you always have reliable data.
    
      
    

![ai-sdr-lead-gen](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3Zn0tdht4EGjrnzcqGyYtp%2Fc91e0447d4907aebb4865644e78703f3%2Fai-sdr-lead-gen.webp&w=3840&q=75)

AI SDR in different sales processes
-----------------------------------

And how do AI SDRs fit into outbound and inbound sales processes? Let’s see. 

  

### Using AI SDRs for outbound sales 

Outbound SDRs always have their plates full. Not that other members of sales teams aren’t busy, but the outbound sales process involves the most draining repetitive tasks, such as:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Email warmup
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Lead discovery and research
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Cold email personalization and outreach
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Follow-ups
    
      
    

  
…and so on in a continuous cycle. AI SDRs can take over _all_ of these outbound sales tasks, saving human SDRs’ energy for handling high-intent leads.

  

**Yes, Ava automates the entire outbound sales process.** Ready to give it a try? [Talk to our sales team.](https://www.artisan.co/talk-to-sales?page_source=/talk-to-sales)

  

### Using AI SDRs for inbound sales

AI SDRs are primarily used for automating outbound processes, and understandably so. It's easier to rely on AI when there's minimal risk involved. _If they find good leads, great! If not, it's no big deal._

  
![automate-and-scale](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1BRx1MwzdewbrrcDvbPY21%2Fe22691e7416a51a0b4b46d7a8a974693%2Fautomate-and-scale.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Inbound sales are trickier. We’ve all had our share of impersonal AI chatbot interactions and don’t want to lose those inbound leads to a glitchy AI process. But it's time to leave that mindset in the past.

  

AI SDRs go far beyond crafting cold emails. They can support inbound sales by:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Automating meeting scheduling
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Identifying high-intent buyers with AI-driven sentiment analysis
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Transcribing and summarizing discovery calls
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Preparing sales meeting agenda
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Crafting follow-ups
    
      
    

  
You can start introducing AI SDRs into inbound sales by letting them take over neglected tasks. Say, if your agents fail to regularly analyze their calls _(we know they do),_ let AI SDRs handle it. Enjoyed the results? Gradually increase their responsibilities.

  

Impact on sales teams
---------------------

[Eighty-two percent](https://offers.hubspot.com/sales-trends-report)
 of sales reps agree that building relationships and connecting are the most important and fulfilling aspects of their job. With AI, they can finally focus on it.

  
![ai-sdr-banner](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3gbBpPzXERC4pq7s2a3oEL%2Fd4b9fbe6fa486adbe8dd7d201e7bb4fe%2Fai-sdr-banner.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Depending on your current structure and needs, an AI SDR like Ava can assume various responsibilities within your SDR team:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **One-person outbound sales team.** As a solo startup founder, you can rely on AI SDRs to fill your calendar with sales calls. No need to hire a dedicated team with your limited resources.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Top-of-funnel lead generator.** If your A-level SDR team is struggling to meet quotas, bring in AI SDRs to swiftly fill the top of the funnel with qualified leads.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Pocket assistant for human SDRs.** AI-powered virtual assistants can free up your SDRs for high-priority tasks by automating manual processes from lead qualification to copywriting.
    
      
    

**Ava can replicate your top-performing BDRs and share their strategies across your entire team.** Ready to give it a try? [Hire Ava now](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
.

  

Future of AI SDR
----------------

Given the rapid pace of AI development, any long-term prediction seems too vague _(and futuristic)_. It will only take months before AI SDRs will become even more sophisticated and widespread.

  
![growth-trust-ai](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F2RH5UgSE1BMEfRKS2l3yQq%2F4005e8140b15e100efcf78eb4c53960c%2Fgrowth-trust-ai.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### Growing trust in AI 

[Seventy-eight percent](https://research.g2.com/2023-buyer-behavior-report)
 of buyers already trust the accuracy and reliability of AI-powered solutions. This number is only increasing as language learning models and AI solutions continue to improve their accuracy.

  

With [66% of B2B sales teams](https://offers.hubspot.com/ai-sales)
 having already invested in AI or automation tools, AI SDRs will soon become an inseparable part of successful sales teams.

  

### More capabilities to come

Technological development has accelerated to a point where you don’t have to wait for the next major update for years.

  

For now, most AI SDRs successfully handle outbound activities like lead qualification and cold outreach. In a few months, our developers will release many more capabilities, including call monitoring, direct meeting scheduling capabilities, sales agenda outlining, and more. 

  

Ava and other AI SDRs are on track to offer end-to-end sales development solutions, consolidating fragmented product stacks under one roof.

  

**Get started with an AI SDR now.** [Hire Ava now](https://artisan.co/ava-sales-rep/)
, and she’ll launch a lead generation campaign for you immediately.

What Is an AI SDR and How Do They Work?
=======================================

Updated On: July 29, 2024

10 minutes read

![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/copy-link.svg)[![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/mail.svg)](mailto:?body=https://www.artisan.co/blog/ai-sdr)

![What Is an AI SDR and How Do They Work?](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F77twxn147kbpRFXkGxjmuM%2F5dc2ef64bb5e3d71f31f9c96bf85e5a6%2FArtboard_16.webp&w=3840&q=75)

What if you could bring in thousands of more leads without expanding your SDR team? Well, you can.

  

AI SDRs are no longer a thing of the future—they're here and taking over the workflows that have slowed our sales teams for decades.

  

In this guide, we'll introduce you to AI SDRs and show you how to implement them into your workflows to generate more _qualified_ leads.

  

Understanding AI SDRs
---------------------

With only [17% of reps](https://www.techtarget.com/white-paper-ebook/how-does-your-sales-development-program-measure-up/)
 achieving 90% or higher of quota, AI SDRs are shifting from being a "nice to have" to becoming a major competitive advantage for sales teams.

  
![ai-vs-sdr](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3n63zl0JDoIZYZhizXnjhz%2Ffda06a35a9577c6ffaf9f4564064d117%2Fai-vs-sdr.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### What is an AI SDR?

An AI SDR, or AI sales development representative, is software that uses artificial intelligence to perform the tasks typically handled by a human SDR.

  

The use cases of AI SDRs in sales teams vary. You might entrust them with the entire prospecting process or have them handle specific manual tasks, freeing up your human SDRs to focus on things that matter most. How deeply you integrate AI SDRs in your workflows depends on your comfort with the technology and the sophistication of your tech stack.

  

Further down the article, we’ll give you all the information you need to choose the best approach for your business.

  

AI vs Human SDRs
----------------

When thinking about adding AI to your team, it's normal to ask, _"How does AI compare to human employees?"_ 

  

So, let's break it down and explore the differences and benefits of each.

  

#### AI SDRs

In many instances, AI SDRs outperform human agents:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Scalable processes.** Most SDR tasks like cold outreach, follow-ups, and lead scoring are repeatable. With a well-structured process in place, AI can take over these tasks and reach your SDR quota way faster.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Consistent messaging.** You don’t have to worry about your messages sounding off. Unlike humans, AI sticks to the script.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Automated optimization.** AI SDRs constantly evaluate their performance in the background and make adjustments on the fly. No need to spend hours poring over data.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Lower investment.** Scaling SDR with AI doesn’t come with payroll costs or extensive training programs.
    
      
    

**Ava is an AI SDR ready to take over your outbound prospecting.** [Discover](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 how she can accelerate your sales process.  

  

#### Human SDRs

Yet there are traits only inherent to human SDRs: 

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Decision-making in unscripted scenarios.** While AI can make decisions based on data input, only human SDRs can manage situations that deviate from the ordinary.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Ability to build personal connection and rapport with customers.** Humans can apply their personal traits and emotional intelligence to appeal to leads and create stronger connections with them. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Understanding of cultural nuances and subtle cues.** Human SDRs better handle ongoing conversations for their ability to spot and interpret cultural nuances and contextual cues.
    
      
    

**  
Who comes out on top in the AI SDR vs. human SDR debate?** While we'd love to offer a new angle, the answer remains the same: there's no competition between AI and humans to determine winners and losers. AI SDRs will scale your operations and remove the need to hire more SDRs, but you still need a human to move your qualified leads down the funnel.

  
![human-sdr](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4nNfy6sdMg4rRlby3o1YSK%2Fcdaeb42d3fbab06fe43e8d43915f6f89%2Fhuman-sdr.webp&w=3840&q=75)

4 Reasons to implement AI SDRs
------------------------------

In 2023, less than [5% of B2B sales activities](https://www.gartner.com/en/newsroom/press-releases/2023-09-21-gartner-expects-sixty-percent-of-seller-work-to-be-executed-by-generative-ai-technologies-within-five-years)
 were powered by generative AI technologies. By 2028, the number will reach 60%. Such a trend is easily explained by the numerous benefits of AI in sales, particularly in SDR.

  

### Automate and scale prospecting

Struggling to meet your monthly quota? It's no surprise—your human SDRs spend hours scouring databases, scraping the web for personalization insights, and crafting individualized messages, over and over again. Oh, and don’t forget about follow-ups… 

  

With AI SDRs, you can automate all these tasks so your human agents can focus solely on mapping out the process. 

  

**Ava has a database of 300M+ B2B prospects that she can instantly search to pinpoint your target customer personas.** She also automatically scrapes the web and social media pages to find insights that she uses to personalize the emails she writes. [Try Ava now.](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)

  

### Create a consistent experience for leads

Misspelling names, forgetting follow-ups, or having to change communication points—these can happen even to the best SDRs. _Do we even need to discuss how it impacts the lead experience?_

  

AI SDRs let you create a smooth experience for every contact, no matter what. They don’t have vacations or bad days—nothing slips through the cracks in AI-powered processes.

  

In Artisan, you can create a three-step email sequence that will be sent out every two days so you don’t have to worry about manual follow-ups. If the lead replies, Ava will stop the sequence.

  
![consistent-experience](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1wZULY7jP5FKlQyLKqDuti%2F16e60d88e18a408730f89696c87b0eb5%2Fconsistent-experience.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### Enhance your outreach with data-driven actions

AI is great at analyzing data—it can handle large amounts of information and find patterns that humans might miss.

  

Best of all, AI SDRs can use the data to act fast. For example, they can send a follow-up message when a user repeatedly visits your site or reach out to a prospect after they've posted a career update on LinkedIn.

  

### Let human SDRs focus on high-priority tasks

AI SDRs are primarily designed to free up your human agents for more critical responsibilities. If your human SDRs have been struggling to prioritize leads and connect with high-ticket prospects, now is the time to address it.

  

**Curious about what Ava can do for your sales team?** [Hire Ava now](https://artisan.co/ava-sales-rep/)
 to experience how AI can accelerate your outbound cycle. She can automate over 80% of manual tasks!

  

The Top 5 AI SDRs
-----------------

Before we dive deeper into the specific applications of AI SDRs in the sales process, let's take a look at the technology that makes it all possible _(and prove we aren’t talking science fiction)_.

  

### 1\. Artisan

![artisan](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1XONz1oRXCge0sx8pGGbwf%2F9c6d17d69fad8b536b5112815549508b%2Fartisan.webp&w=3840&q=75)

At Artisan, we’ve developed an [AI SDR Ava](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 to help businesses automate over 80% of the outbound demand generation process.

  

**What Ava does:**

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Communicates with your sales team through a chat interface
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Understands your ideal customer profile (ICP) based on your product description, target audience, and their pain points
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Prospects leads by scraping over 300M contacts in 200 countries across B2B partners’ databases
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Enriches leads with third party sources like CrunchBase and web scraping their Twitter, LinkedIn and website
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Writes hyper-personalized outreach to leads following different cold email strategies with AI Sales Playbooks 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Uses AI-powered automation to follow up with leads
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Manages deliverability with email warmup, dynamic send limits, and many other tools
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Integrates with HubSpot, Salesforce, and other systems
    
      
    

  
With Ava, you have full control over your brand voice without having to micromanage it. You can choose one of the [AI Sales Playbooks](https://www.artisan.co/products/sales-playbooks)
 to determine how Ava will approach your leads. 

  
![playbook](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F37Rgod1zduhkac1a248BKM%2Fd2d31c174fc4b0bbbdc78179a4ec38b0%2Fplaybook.webp&w=3840&q=75)

_All in all, nothing speaks better than customers’ success stories, right?_ Medical contract research organization (CRO) [bioaccess](https://www.bioaccessla.com/)
 entrusted Ava with business development. In just two months, Julio Martinez-Clark, CEO of bioaccess, reports outstanding results:

  

_“I have been using Ava for about two months. I have had a consistent +3% response rate and four sales calls leading to potential sales. Ava simplifies my company’s business development process and fills my calendar with sales calls. This is precisely what I wanted. I wouldn’t trade Ava for anything else in the market!”_

  

Julio Martinez-Clark, CEO of [bioaccess](https://www.bioaccessla.com/)

  

**Ready to hit your SDR quota?** [Let Ava](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 **automate your outbound workflows and free up your SDRs for more important tasks.** 

  

### 2\. AiSDR

![aisdr](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3MGfHjzWJxyj0MGldZ2eYc%2F03955716ab30939893ee47b3d4d60734%2Faisdr.webp&w=3840&q=75)

AiSDR provides AI bots for sales development, focusing on crafting realistic AI emails. 

  

Similar to Ava, AiSDR scrapes a vast lead database and initiates conversations with leads that match your ICP. The system analyzes leads' latest LinkedIn activity and uses the data to personalize cold pitches.

  

Users have noted that AiSDR lacks integrations with essential business software such as Salesforce. If integration capabilities are critical for you, consider alternative options from our list.

  

### 3\. 11x

![11x](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3pvK5G1Oe6U2PL6WmuLoUa%2Fa5c1cc27d258af1d136436cc6580e4c3%2F11x.webp&w=3840&q=75)

On a mission to empower teams with AI workers, 11x has recently introduced Alice, an AI-powered SDR.

  

Alice identifies potential buyers, researches relevant lead data, and engages them with personalized messages - but you are not able to communicate with Alice. Users have reported issues with bugs on the platform leading to emails being generated in the wrong language.

  

### 4\. Relevance.ai

![relevance-ai](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F6Rw6nVaWCN1ZJ4iZYI8C5Z%2F6f80b7bc748694573a3930fce3de8ee4%2Frelevance-ai.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Meet Bosh, the AI SDR from Relevance.ai.

  

Bosh offers flexibility and integration options. You can deeply integrate it into your workflows, going beyond outbound and prospecting tasks, but the company does not specialize in creating AI SDRs, hence it is less of a focus for them.

  

Of course, this flexibility comes with a trade-off. Setting up the agent involves extensive training, configuring, and testing the bot.

  

### Integrating AI SDR with existing sales workflows

_“Okay, that sounds good in theory. How do I fit them into my workflows?”_

  

Well, the answer depends on what your existing workflows look like and to what extent you want to automate them with AI SDRs. But regardless of the specifics, your AI SDR integration starts here:

  

#### CRM integration

So you’re managing your sales process through a CRM system. You can integrate your AI SDRs with it to track your interaction with prospects across all channels in one place.

  
![crm-integration](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F9wmbmcGzEM2Fu2TlaaG2I%2Fb996520f25ac3cc44972dd3b602447b5%2Fcrm-integration.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Ava, for instance, integrates seamlessly with HubSpot and Salesforce, allowing sales teams to: 

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Prevent outreach to existing customers and prospects
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Export all lead data to a centralized system
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Build a pipeline with highly qualified leads
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Reach out to existing prospects that have gone cold
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Build custom sales workflows powered by GenAI 
    
      
    

  
You can start by using your AI SDR to find and nurture qualified leads, then send them to your CRM system's pipeline for further processing.

  

#### Unified communication channels

Even if you entrust your prospecting process to AI SDRs, you’ll want to stay updated on those conversations. By integrating them into your company’s unified communications, you’ll keep everyone involved updated on the prospecting process and lead updates.

  

Ava integrates with Slack, so you don’t have to keep logging into Artisan for updates. All notifications will appear in a dedicated channel you can share with specific team members.

  
![unified-communication](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2FoSQ8YxGKZLRiMPmmD5xxK%2F4a3aa5c2844ada24a71bb7cfcc47a502%2Funified-communication.webp&w=3840&q=75)

#### Automated task assignment

Depending on how deeply you integrate AI into your sales workflows, you’ll want to interfere at different stages. 

  

If you’re just starting out, you may want to approve all of your AI SDR’s actions before it proceeds. As you gain confidence in the system, you might only need to intervene when a user responds to the AI outreach or even later in the process. 

  

This is where you need to integrate your AI SDRs with your task management software—so you don’t have to manually review every step in the AI workflow and _inevitably_ miss crucial moments for intervention. 

  

Whether you use ClickUp, Monday, or manage your team’s tasks directly in your CRM system, Ava will soon be able to seamlessly integrate with any platform through Zapier. Simply set trigger events and let automation update your team’s to-do list.

  

**Want to try Ava for yourself?** [Hire Ava now](https://artisan.co/ava-sales-rep/)
, and she’ll execute successful outbound strategies to boost your conversion rates. Get more meetings booked into your calendar instantly.

  

AI SDR in lead generation
-------------------------

Lead generation is typically the most repetitive and automatable task in SDR—perfect for being offloaded to AI. 

  

Here’s how AI SDRs enhance lead generation:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **More accurate lead qualification.** In 2023, [41% of sales pros](https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/ai-sales-prospecting)
     were already using AI tools to qualify leads. Considering the rapid adoption of AI, these numbers have likely skyrocketed since then. Clearly, AI SDRs will soon be indispensable to the lead qualification process.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Personalized outreach at scale.** When you have 200 pre-qualified leads in your pipeline, spending just two minutes to personalize each message would take almost seven hours of work. AI SDRs can do it faster and without errors. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **24/7 operation.** AI SDRs don’t sleep, take breaks, or go on vacation. They can work around the clock, making contact with leads at the best times, regardless of the time zone.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Lead enrichment.** Keeping lead profiles updated is hard. AI SDRs like [Artisan’s Ava](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
     continuously scrape web and third-party data to update your leads' profiles with relevant information, ensuring you always have reliable data.
    
      
    

![ai-sdr-lead-gen](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3Zn0tdht4EGjrnzcqGyYtp%2Fc91e0447d4907aebb4865644e78703f3%2Fai-sdr-lead-gen.webp&w=3840&q=75)

AI SDR in different sales processes
-----------------------------------

And how do AI SDRs fit into outbound and inbound sales processes? Let’s see. 

  

### Using AI SDRs for outbound sales 

Outbound SDRs always have their plates full. Not that other members of sales teams aren’t busy, but the outbound sales process involves the most draining repetitive tasks, such as:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Email warmup
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Lead discovery and research
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Cold email personalization and outreach
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Follow-ups
    
      
    

  
…and so on in a continuous cycle. AI SDRs can take over _all_ of these outbound sales tasks, saving human SDRs’ energy for handling high-intent leads.

  

**Yes, Ava automates the entire outbound sales process.** Ready to give it a try? [Talk to our sales team.](https://www.artisan.co/talk-to-sales?page_source=/talk-to-sales)

  

### Using AI SDRs for inbound sales

AI SDRs are primarily used for automating outbound processes, and understandably so. It's easier to rely on AI when there's minimal risk involved. _If they find good leads, great! If not, it's no big deal._

  
![automate-and-scale](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1BRx1MwzdewbrrcDvbPY21%2Fe22691e7416a51a0b4b46d7a8a974693%2Fautomate-and-scale.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Inbound sales are trickier. We’ve all had our share of impersonal AI chatbot interactions and don’t want to lose those inbound leads to a glitchy AI process. But it's time to leave that mindset in the past.

  

AI SDRs go far beyond crafting cold emails. They can support inbound sales by:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Automating meeting scheduling
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Identifying high-intent buyers with AI-driven sentiment analysis
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Transcribing and summarizing discovery calls
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Preparing sales meeting agenda
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Crafting follow-ups
    
      
    

  
You can start introducing AI SDRs into inbound sales by letting them take over neglected tasks. Say, if your agents fail to regularly analyze their calls _(we know they do),_ let AI SDRs handle it. Enjoyed the results? Gradually increase their responsibilities.

  

Impact on sales teams
---------------------

[Eighty-two percent](https://offers.hubspot.com/sales-trends-report)
 of sales reps agree that building relationships and connecting are the most important and fulfilling aspects of their job. With AI, they can finally focus on it.

  
![ai-sdr-banner](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3gbBpPzXERC4pq7s2a3oEL%2Fd4b9fbe6fa486adbe8dd7d201e7bb4fe%2Fai-sdr-banner.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Depending on your current structure and needs, an AI SDR like Ava can assume various responsibilities within your SDR team:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **One-person outbound sales team.** As a solo startup founder, you can rely on AI SDRs to fill your calendar with sales calls. No need to hire a dedicated team with your limited resources.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Top-of-funnel lead generator.** If your A-level SDR team is struggling to meet quotas, bring in AI SDRs to swiftly fill the top of the funnel with qualified leads.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Pocket assistant for human SDRs.** AI-powered virtual assistants can free up your SDRs for high-priority tasks by automating manual processes from lead qualification to copywriting.
    
      
    

**Ava can replicate your top-performing BDRs and share their strategies across your entire team.** Ready to give it a try? [Hire Ava now](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
.

  

Future of AI SDR
----------------

Given the rapid pace of AI development, any long-term prediction seems too vague _(and futuristic)_. It will only take months before AI SDRs will become even more sophisticated and widespread.

  
![growth-trust-ai](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F2RH5UgSE1BMEfRKS2l3yQq%2F4005e8140b15e100efcf78eb4c53960c%2Fgrowth-trust-ai.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### Growing trust in AI 

[Seventy-eight percent](https://research.g2.com/2023-buyer-behavior-report)
 of buyers already trust the accuracy and reliability of AI-powered solutions. This number is only increasing as language learning models and AI solutions continue to improve their accuracy.

  

With [66% of B2B sales teams](https://offers.hubspot.com/ai-sales)
 having already invested in AI or automation tools, AI SDRs will soon become an inseparable part of successful sales teams.

  

### More capabilities to come

Technological development has accelerated to a point where you don’t have to wait for the next major update for years.

  

For now, most AI SDRs successfully handle outbound activities like lead qualification and cold outreach. In a few months, our developers will release many more capabilities, including call monitoring, direct meeting scheduling capabilities, sales agenda outlining, and more. 

  

Ava and other AI SDRs are on track to offer end-to-end sales development solutions, consolidating fragmented product stacks under one roof.

  

**Get started with an AI SDR now.** [Hire Ava now](https://artisan.co/ava-sales-rep/)
, and she’ll launch a lead generation campaign for you immediately.
