Still early for AI functionality | $14 - $99 | Now you know what’s on offer, let’s jump into detailed reviews of the leading Apollo alternatives and find the one that's the perfect fit for your business.  1\. Artisan ----------- ![Artisan Homepage Screenshot](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3iMLW1oB3n7XEZwVilgwp7%2F5dde3325aea1873626267f74024f3ae2%2FScreenshot__686_.png&w=3840&q=75) Artisan is an AI-first, all-in-one outbound sales automation and lead gen platform. Unlike the other entries on this list, AI is baked right into the core of the software in a very nuanced and wide-reaching way.  Artisan’s AI engine is a human-like “employee” called Ava. She’s a virtual business development representative (BDR) who can automate 80% of the outbound sales process and will get your first campaign up and running over the course of a 10-minute conversation.  Ava puts together your ideal customer profile, prospects the Artisan database of over 300 million contacts, filters and enriches the leads, and crafts and sends bespoke email sequences. You can also, of course, access features manually where appropriate and have full control over what’s automated. ![Ava for Apollo](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F2ZnS0QSbrGWM95zT0rbxV%2F83478b5bc6f3a267fd151b2e6919e124%2F4.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Key Features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Baked-in AI engine.** Artisan’s AI sales development representative (SDR), Ava, streamlines and improves every part of the outbound sales process, from campaign setup to the actual outreach itself.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Lead database.** Apollo’s database has over 300 million leads across 200 countries with up-to-date and fully enriched lead data.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Web scraping.** Ava collects data points from a wide set of sources, including company websites and social media like LinkedIn and Twitter.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Workflow replication.** Already have successful outbound sales workflows? Excellent. Ava can replicate and automate them in Artisan by building a dedicated playbook for your target outreach and email sequences.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Email automation.** Artisan’s email outreach tools are fully automated, with timezone tracking, translation, bounce testing, and dynamic send limits baked in. Send follow-up emails, receive notifications about interested leads, and manage responses via the intuitive email dashboard.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Email warmup.** Built-in email warmup service ensures that your mailboxes are prepped and ready to go without fear of penalties. No need to pay for a dedicated third-party warmup service.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Analytics.** You’ll have access to comprehensive data about your campaigns with metrics like lead response rate, mailbox health, most successful campaigns, and more.  ![Ava-Apollo-5](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5nXKlYy1QssFZBASR9OY1s%2F9a20d4c40833038dbed95104161d7d83%2F5.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Pricing Artisan pricing varies based on the lead volume and customization required. However, you’ll get one-on-one onboarding, and there’s no charge until your campaign is firing on all cylinders (so you’re not worrying about idle time).  For a pricing consultation and to learn how Ava can boost your sales enablement, reach out to Artisan’s sales team. ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Uses active web scraping and AI enrichment to identify a wide range of lead data points including intent and technographic data * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Comprehensive platform for all aspects of sales outreach * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Automation for every stage of your outbound workflow * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Automates email writing based on successful email playbooks and emulation of true human style * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Built-in hallucination checks to prevent AI-related mistakes * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) At the forefront of AI to create hyper-personalized research, enrichment, and outreach workflows ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) As an early-stage startup, some features are missing (though Artisan is growing very quickly, and new functionality is being added weekly) * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Expensive for smaller companies compared to more basic automation software 2\. ZoomInfo ------------ ![ZoomInfo](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F6WAdf9EteeoDUecf5rrpRg%2F1443965886aa1b9085f06e22dd953b09%2FScreenshot__688_.png&w=3840&q=75) ZoomInfo is a B2B sales intelligence and outreach platform that also provides a layer of engagement tools, such as web chat and web form optimization. It’s aimed at B2B enterprises and boasts a solid database of B2B data. In addition to the desktop app, users can also take advantage of a Chrome extension for prospecting on the go.  ### Key features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Customizable enterprise tools.** Leverage APIs and data-as-a-service (DaaS) options to customize enterprise solutions.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Lead database.** Access a large database of prospects with automated enrichment and segmentation. * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Integrations library.** Integrate with many third-party platforms like AWS and Snowflake.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Automation.** Automate email sequences and parts of the phone outreach process.  ### Pricing Pricing isn’t publicly available. Users indicate that pricing is at the enterprise level and expensive compared to other providers.  ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Large set of enterprise-level features, including APIs * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Interface is easy to configure and use * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) A large set of integrations with third-party solutions ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Analysis of user reviews indicates that the platform is expensive * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Limited AI functionality  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) There are many complaints about unresponsive customer service 3\. HubSpot Sales Hub --------------------- ![HubSpot](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F7beNOHp5ZeejOaz5AOigD0%2Fdb76114e44a9d602c244e8603d4d70e0%2FScreenshot__689_.png&w=3840&q=75) Ah, good ol’ HubSpot. It seems that nowadays, no software review is complete without HubSpot getting at least a passing mention.  Sales Hub is a standalone solution (although it does, of course, integrate with the HubSpot CRM) and has pricing tiers that cater to the whole spectrum of business users, from solopreneurs to multinational enterprises.  ### Key features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Sales engagement sequences.** Build and automate email outreach sequences.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Lead scoring.** Score and track the progress of your leads.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **CRM integration.** Integrate Sales Hub easily with your HubSpot CRM if you use it.  ### Pricing Hubspot has three pricing tiers and a free plan. The “Starter” package is **$20/month per user**, the “Professional” package is **$100/month per user**, and the “Enterprise” package is **$150/month** per user.  ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Integrates directly with the broader HubSpot CRM * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Includes a meeting scheduler and invoicing tools  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Easy-to-use platform and large community    ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) No lead database  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) AI functionality is limited to writing emails * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Per-user pricing can quickly add up  4\. LinkedIn Sales Navigator ---------------------------- ![LinkedIn Sales](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3TUUXBsBvJszciW6TQrReG%2F9f7681d2a69d2ecb2bd411554d98c77b%2FScreenshot__690_.png&w=3840&q=75) LinkedIn Sales Navigator is one of the most popular sales prospecting tools, largely by virtue of the fact LinkedIn can advertise to virtually every sales professional on the planet.  Automation features are limited, and, perhaps counterintuitively, its database is relatively small compared to other providers because it only provides access to individuals and companies with profiles.  ### Key features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Lead database.** Access a database of around 60 million LinkedIn users.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Intent tracking.** Filter leads based on signals like job changes and profile visits.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Integrations library.** Integrate with top CRMs like HubSpot and Salesforce.  ### Pricing Sales Navigator “Core” costs **$99/month,** and Sales Navigator “Advanced” costs **$169.99/month**. A custom plan with additional features is also available.  ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Useful for manual LinkedIn outreach of warm prospects * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) High-quality lead data  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Integrates with the main CRMs ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Small database * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Limited automation and AI functionality  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Most advanced features require a custom plan 5\. Lusha --------- ![Lusha](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F6Oqg3EuNl6qehQSW2tLHDC%2F9616b2dcce0ea465ae8065766dc36801%2FScreenshot__691_.png&w=3840&q=75) Lusha is a rising star in the sales prospecting space. It’s garnering a reputation as a solid source of email contact data—with rigorous email verification criteria—but has mixed reviews when it comes to phone numbers.  ### Key features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Lead database:** Prospect from a database of 50 million enterprise accounts, with many GDPR-compliant leads.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Intent filter.** Track intent and lead readiness with behavioral data.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Workflow automation.** Automate email sequences and lead identification.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **LinkedIn browser extension.** Prospect from LinkedIn while browsing.  ### Pricing Lusha has two paid tiers in addition to free and custom plans. The “Pro” plan is **$49/month** per user, and the “Premium” plan is **$79/month** per user.  ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Transparent pricing for smaller companies  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Emphasis on GDPR-compliant data  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Simple and intuitive platform ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Phone data requires credits * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Few segmentation features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Lack of AI functionality 6\. Seamless.AI --------------- ![Seamless.AI](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4sTfWwrH1eidqzOGs9wWHg%2F267457767137048e5bf6162f6e4655e0%2FScreenshot__692_.png&w=3840&q=75) Seamless.AI places AI functionality at the core of its platform, using it to verify and enrich B2B contact data and lead lists and automate cold email outreach.  It works on a lead credit basis, so there will be limits on how much outreach you can conduct if you opt for Seamless.AI.  ### **Key features** * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **AI-enriched lead database.** Access a large database of prospects with AI-enriched data.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Workflow automation.** Send automated email outreach and follow-up with emails written by AI. * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Lead search engine.** Search directly for leads using the prospect “real-time search engine.” ### Pricing Seamless.AI offers a free trial with 50 credits. Contact sales to learn about pricing for the “Basic,” “Pro,” and “Enterprise” plans. User reviews indicate that pricing starts at approximately **$150/month**.   ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Strong AI functionality * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Automation tools for email sequences * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Lead search engine for finding individual sales leads ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Credit-based structure, which can restrict outreach * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Limited customer support on “Basic” plan * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Many advanced features like intent signals are only available on the “Pro” plan and above 7\. Hunter ---------- ![Hunter](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5Z4JabrLAXzZGoZNPOOGDz%2F46a0bb8850bd0b7ae82193b1655d066d%2FScreenshot__693_.png&w=3840&q=75) Email is Hunter’s thing. It’s a good Apollo’s alternative but focused on near-exclusively email, with little additional lead data.  While Hunter does have discovery and prospecting features, it’s better understood as an email finder rather than a sales outreach one. It’s a potential option for smaller businesses without complex prospecting requirements.  ### Key features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Email search tool.** Search for email addresses at target companies and run email verification.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Campaign automation.** Run semi-automated email campaigns on the platform.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Integrations.** Integrate with the most popular CRMs and use the browser extension to enhance prospecting.  ### Pricing Hunter has a free plan with 25/searches per month. The “Starter” plan is **$49.00/month**, the “Growth” plan is **$149/month**, and the “Business” plan is **$499/month**. Hunter also has an enterprise tier.  ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Good email data accuracy * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Unlimited users (limits are based on monthly searches) * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Browser add-on ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) No phone data * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Restrictions on the number of email searches per month * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Limited automation and AI features 8\. RocketReach --------------- ![RocketReach](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1eVqG3pYcUINUtcHBqZHy6%2F5a25b225d02b6232002678ecf79efec4%2FScreenshot__694_.png&w=3840&q=75) RocketReach has a colossal database of 700 million leads and a strong set of lead-generation automation features.  That said, users have raised concerns about the quality of B2B email and direct dials. In addition, to access unlimited data, you need to subscribe to an annual plan.  ### Key features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Leads database.** Access a huge database of 700 million leads. * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Intent signals.** Tailor outreach to target individuals with strong buyer intent.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **API.** Rocket offers an API for enterprise use.  ### Pricing RocketReach offers a range of pricing tiers from **$39.00/month** (individual plan) to **$349/month** per user (team plan). You’ll need to purchase an annual plan for unlimited lead data.  ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Large lead database * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Well-priced individual plans * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Email automation ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) The database is of questionable quality based on user reviews * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Forces you to purchase the annual plan to unlock features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) A limited number of integrations 9\. Lead411 ----------- ![lead411](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F192tPqlUyqMjGctuefOszD%2Ff5c103cabee542529dcbbe37cb3551ac%2FScreenshot__696_.png&w=3840&q=75) Lead411 bills itself as the _only_ unlimited B2B data prospecting tool. That’s not quite true—other services don’t cap the amount of lead data you can access—but it does have a pretty sizable database of over 450 million.  Lead411 has added outreach tools for running email campaigns directly to the platform and also offers intent data on its premium plans.  ### **Key features** * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Unlimited data access.** Gather as much lead data (emails and phone numbers) as you want without any limits.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Intent signals.** Track intent signals and score B2B leads (only available on the higher-tier plan).  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Outreach management.** Run email campaigns on the platform, including SMS outreach. ### Pricing Lead411’s “Basic Plus Unlimited” plan costs **$99/month per user**. Intent data is available on the annual “Pro” and “Unlimited” packages. Contact sales for pricing. A free trial is available.  ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Large database with unlimited access * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Integrations with top CRMs * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Chrome extension for prospecting while browsing ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Expensive compared to other Apollo alternatives * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Small number of integrations compared to other tools * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Intent data is not available on all plans 10\. Pipedrive -------------- ![Pipedrive](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2FQV7S0ivkXqIDivsNOTxxu%2F7bd736f3ccc4d68c9af281344e6c76ea%2FScreenshot__697_.png&w=3840&q=75) Pipedrive is a tool for running email campaigns and outreach workflows rather than for prospecting.  It’s an excellent enterprise-level sales enablement platform. But if you’re looking for fresh leads, you’ll need an additional service that provides access to a database.  ### Key features * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Outreach management.** Manage leads and run segmented email campaigns. * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Analytics.** Access granular data about your campaigns across a range of metrics like revenue targets and sales team performance.  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) **Large library of integrations.** Integrate Pipedrive with your whole tech stack.  ### Pricing Pipedrive offers several pricing plans, beginning at **$14/month per user** and ending at **$99/month** **per user**. All plans have free trials.  ### Pros * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Powerful enterprise-level sales enablement platform * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Growing AI functionality  * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Lots of integrations ### Cons * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) It doesn’t provide access to a lead database * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Slightly convoluted pricing structure * ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg) Intuitive and well-designed interface It’s time to say goodbye… ------------------------- We get it. Wading through sales enablement platforms is hard work. Learning to navigate different dashboards is time-consuming and frustrating. But it _is_ worth it.  ![Apollo Alternatives-2](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1B94fTEXazeOSoGpC0lDu8%2Fa909b260d886e56d4442b5d72707ef6e%2F3.webp&w=3840&q=75) The hours you devote to picking the right tool—one that’s ideally suited to your and your team’s specific needs—is time well spent. Leads are the lifeblood of your business. And the tools you use will make a big difference.  As for parting advice, we recommend taking _full_ advantage of free trials and demos. Oh, and don’t forget to give Artisan a test drive. We know you’ll love it. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) --------------------------------- **What is Apollo.io?** Apollo is a lead prospecting and outreach platform. Its user base has grown substantially over the last several years and is now a market leader. Its top features include an extensive lead database and outreach automation tools.  **Why consider alternatives to Apollo.io?** Alternatives to Apollo may offer features better suited to your needs. Apollo’s competitors sometimes perform better in terms of database size, AI functionality, ease of use, and pricing, to name some examples.  **Which tool is best for small businesses?** Hunter, RocketReach, and Lusha all have pricing tiers that will appeal to small businesses. HubSpot Sales Hub is also a good option but doesn’t provide lead data.  **How to evaluate sales automation tools?** To evaluate sales automation tools, take full advantage of free trials, check the quality of the lead database by conducting your own searches, check user reviews, and don’t hesitate to contact support with questions.  Share Article ![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/copy-link.svg)[![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/mail.svg)](mailto:?body=https://www.artisan.co/blog/apollo-alternatives) You might also like ------------------- Ready to Supercharge Your Outbound? ----------------------------------- Our AI-first platform equips your team with best-in-class outbound tools and our AI BDR Ava, who automates your entire outbound workflow. Phone Get Started ### Products * [Artisan Sales Overview](/sales-ai) * [Ava, the AI Sales Agent](/ai-sales-agent) * [B2B Data](/products/b2b-data) * [Sales Playbooks](/products/sales-playbooks) * [Email Warmup](/products/email-warmup) * [Sales Automation](/products/sales-automation) ### Resources * [Blog](/blog) * [Demos](/watch-demo) * [Support](https://support.artisan.co/) * [Case Studies](/casestudies) * ChangelogSoon ### Solutions * [Enterprise](/solutions/enterprise) * [Midmarket](/solutions/midmarket) * [Startups](/solutions/startups) * Lead Gen AgenciesSoon ### Company * [About Us](/about) * [Contact Us](/contact-us) * [Careers](/careers) * Artisan LabsSoon ![artisan-logo](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Flogo.webp&w=384&q=75) © 2024 Artisan AI Inc. [![artisan-logo](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fartisan-primary-logo.webp&w=64&q=75)![artisan-logo](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fartisan-text-logo.webp&w=256&q=75)](/)

10 Best Outbound Sales Software & Tools for SDRs
================================================

Updated On: July 23, 2024

13 minutes read

![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/copy-link.svg)[![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/mail.svg)](mailto:?body=https://www.artisan.co/blog/outbound-sales-software)

![10 Best Outbound Sales Software & Tools for SDRs](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4BkN8e3DgDjjm7nhny7obN%2F0626a48df35afc31dd965ccfe80fe795%2FArtboard_4.webp&w=3840&q=75)

**How many tools do you need in your tech stack?** According to Gartner, a robust revenue tech stack should include [six core groups](https://www.gartner.com/en/sales/trends/modern-sales-tech-stack)
 of technologies for engagement, application, enablement, revenue operations, infrastructure, and data enrichment. 

  

_That’s a lot of money, huh?_

  
![Tech Stack](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3lhTNOeok82q7DegVc9x4y%2F3226e2eac94c5f06b49e42b629b1ca87%2FTech_Stack.webp&w=3840&q=75)

The good news is, that you don’t have to pay for six platforms to streamline your outbound sales process and beyond. You only need **one to three tools** to consolidate all these features.

  

To help you do more with less, we’ve hand-picked the 10 best outbound sales software for different tasks and needs.

  

1\. Artisan
-----------

![artisan](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1HMOsBY7V409APGInKqNbo%2F30f660a0222d93170a96a6be52673bcc%2Fartisan.webp&w=3840&q=75)

[Artisan](https://www.artisan.co/)
 is more than just a tool for SDRs — it's like having an SDR, BDR, and all-in-one outbound sales automation software in one.

  

Meet Ava, the AI SDR by Artisan, who automates 80% of the outbound sales process. 

  

In just a 10-minute conversation, Ava learns about your ideal customer profile (ICP) and product. Once she understands your needs, she creates an outbound campaign, selects potential leads from her database of over 270 million contacts, and starts prospecting. Alternatively, you can complete the setup process in the campaign editor—Ava will pick up the directions from there.

  

Artisan collects data from a wide range of sources to deliver the most relevant B2B information about your prospects. It scrapes partner data, major social media channels like LinkedIn and Twitter, as well as industry tracking sites like Crunchbase. Ava uses this data to enrich your lead profiles and craft hyper-personalized messages for each.

  

### Key features 

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Ava, the AI sales agent**, acts as an intelligent sales representative, handling much of the outbound process.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Sales automation** streamlines key SDR processes like lead research, personalized sales outreach, email writing, deliverability optimization, etc.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Sales playbooks** define the writing style, tone of voice, and content of your outbound emails.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Lead enrichment** keeps your lead profiles updated with relevant data.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **AI-driven email warmup** boosts your sender reputation and increases the deliverability of your emails.
    
      
    

### Why choose Artisan

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Automation across your entire outbound cycle.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    No need to increase headcount to scale outbound SDR.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Hyper-personalized, AI-driven research workflows.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Consistent messaging across all of your emails.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)

3\. Salesforce

![salesforce](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1H5Yv3cnkVeQZEQnmbsAkv%2Fcdfad32391c17813a3d94f9083224f41%2Fsalesforce.png&w=3840&q=75)

Does it even need an introduction? This well-known sales software has been a powerhouse for over two decades.

  

While it's not cheap and requires significant setup, it's incredibly powerful for mid-sized and large sales teams. Salesforce’s all-in-one CRM solution, Sales Cloud, is highly customizable to meet any business needs and includes various sales automation tools. 

  

Mind that Salesforce’s flexibility comes with high setup costs and a steep learning curve. It’s not another out-of-the-box solution you can log into and start prospecting. While Salesforce _can_ handle outbound sales, that's not its main draw. Businesses choose Salesforce for its ability to automate complex sales cycles, where its complexity really pays off.

  

Salesforce also offers Einstein Copilot, an AI assistant designed to tackle repetitive tasks. It can generate emails, answer questions about your performance, help you prioritize leads, update your pipeline, and more.

10 Best Outbound Sales Software & Tools for SDRs
================================================

Updated On: July 23, 2024

13 minutes read

![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/copy-link.svg)[![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/mail.svg)](mailto:?body=https://www.artisan.co/blog/outbound-sales-software)

![10 Best Outbound Sales Software & Tools for SDRs](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4BkN8e3DgDjjm7nhny7obN%2F0626a48df35afc31dd965ccfe80fe795%2FArtboard_4.webp&w=3840&q=75)

**How many tools do you need in your tech stack?** According to Gartner, a robust revenue tech stack should include [six core groups](https://www.gartner.com/en/sales/trends/modern-sales-tech-stack)
 of technologies for engagement, application, enablement, revenue operations, infrastructure, and data enrichment. 

  

_That’s a lot of money, huh?_

  
![Tech Stack](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3lhTNOeok82q7DegVc9x4y%2F3226e2eac94c5f06b49e42b629b1ca87%2FTech_Stack.webp&w=3840&q=75)

The good news is, that you don’t have to pay for six platforms to streamline your outbound sales process and beyond. You only need **one to three tools** to consolidate all these features.

  

To help you do more with less, we’ve hand-picked the 10 best outbound sales software for different tasks and needs.

  

1\. Artisan
-----------

![artisan](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1HMOsBY7V409APGInKqNbo%2F30f660a0222d93170a96a6be52673bcc%2Fartisan.webp&w=3840&q=75)

[Artisan](https://www.artisan.co/)
 is more than just a tool for SDRs — it's like having an SDR, BDR, and all-in-one outbound sales automation software in one.

  

Meet Ava, the AI SDR by Artisan, who automates 80% of the outbound sales process. 

  

In just a 10-minute conversation, Ava learns about your ideal customer profile (ICP) and product. Once she understands your needs, she creates an outbound campaign, selects potential leads from her database of over 270 million contacts, and starts prospecting. Alternatively, you can complete the setup process in the campaign editor—Ava will pick up the directions from there.

  

Artisan collects data from a wide range of sources to deliver the most relevant B2B information about your prospects. It scrapes partner data, major social media channels like LinkedIn and Twitter, as well as industry tracking sites like Crunchbase. Ava uses this data to enrich your lead profiles and craft hyper-personalized messages for each.

2\. LinkedIn Sales Navigator
----------------------------

![linkedin](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F49BBWFYN7dXpDD4J95QzUy%2F00b7692646efb427975b6e02f99236b1%2Flinkedin.png&w=3840&q=75)

If you do prospecting on LinkedIn, this is likely the first software option that comes to mind—and for good reason.

  

LinkedIn Sales Navigator is LinkedIn's native sales tool for prospecting and relationship building. It's an excellent choice for small and mid-sized businesses looking for their first SDR tool.

  

The platform provides access to numerous features and filters that simplify the lead search process. You can use advanced search filters for criteria such as recent job changes, seniority level, and companies with job openings, in addition to standard filters like job title and industry. 

  

Once you've identified potential leads, you can create prospect lists, set up alerts to track their activity or start outreach campaigns immediately.

  
![linkedin](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2FM2N1S91UZnL0RsFDF0EYM%2F75c2dfa9164ab5ef9e4800ea8d1e3a65%2Flinkedin.webp&w=3840&q=75)

3\. Salesforce
==============

![salesforce](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F1H5Yv3cnkVeQZEQnmbsAkv%2Fcdfad32391c17813a3d94f9083224f41%2Fsalesforce.png&w=3840&q=75)

Does it even need an introduction? This well-known sales software has been a powerhouse for over two decades.

  

While it's not cheap and requires significant setup, it's incredibly powerful for mid-sized and large sales teams. Salesforce’s all-in-one CRM solution, Sales Cloud, is highly customizable to meet any business needs and includes various sales automation tools. 

  

Mind that Salesforce’s flexibility comes with high setup costs and a steep learning curve. It’s not another out-of-the-box solution you can log into and start prospecting. While Salesforce _can_ handle outbound sales, that's not its main draw. Businesses choose Salesforce for its ability to automate complex sales cycles, where its complexity really pays off.

  

Salesforce also offers Einstein Copilot, an AI assistant designed to tackle repetitive tasks. It can generate emails, answer questions about your performance, help you prioritize leads, update your pipeline, and more.

  
![Intergration salesforce](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4MHFpwQsHnj6VaRIMTrZ7M%2Fe80fdb27f4ec78581eb42b1679451d3b%2FIntergration_salesforce.webp&w=3840&q=75)

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Integration capabilities** with various business applications allow you to seamlessly sync Salesforce data with other business tools and systems.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Einstein Copilot AI assistant** enables task automation and provides quick insights.
    
      
    

### Why choose Salesforce

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    An advanced platform that has everything you need _(given that you build it by yourself)._
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)

### Salesforce’s limitations

4\. Pipedrive
-------------

![pipedrive](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4m5XHEWdiZTrk3X2rhXVi6%2F46a87bdd1c6b790428115b0cabf8e92b%2Fpipedrive.png&w=3840&q=75)

Like Salesforce, Pipedrive isn’t exactly an outbound prospecting tool. It’s a sales automation and pipeline management tool with the capability to build outbound workflows. 

  

In Pipedrive, sales teams can handle leads and deals from beginning to end. However, contrary to Salesforce, it’s also more intuitive and out-of-the-box _(and, therefore, less flexible)._

  

For SDRs, the platform provides convenient task reminders, triggered messages, automated follow-ups, and an AI sales assistant. Pipedrive's AI enhances outbound workflows with actions like recommending high-potential deals and suggesting priority actions to streamline sales processes.

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)

6\. Growbots
------------

![growbots](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F41bmMgbvcvPdwY5TJP2Q9%2Fe4037f766aa32beeb60d664f6c081ae7%2Fgrowbots.png&w=3840&q=75)

Shifting away from conventional sales CRMs, Growbots specializes in dedicated prospecting software designed for small businesses.

  

The platform automates outbound sales processes like prospect search, lead enrichment, email sequences, follow-ups, and more. 

  

The search filters are particularly handy; in addition to basic criteria like company size and industry, they allow you to identify qualified leads based on factors such as funding rounds and the technologies used on their company websites.

  
![gong](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F3Fciyu4T856JzBzVWzN9lG%2F11814fa50dfe66cd80e6adefdf33e7c9%2Fgong.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### Growbots features

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Prospecting tools** find and qualify potential leads based on your ICP.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **The outreach platform** automates and speeds up your lead outreach and nurturing workflows.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Email warm-up service** develops your sender reputation and improves cold email deliverability.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Email health check** is an additional service provided by Growbots for those needing help maintaining sender account compliance.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Concierge** is another extra service by Growbots that allows you to outsource your outbound sales efforts.
    
      
    

### Why choose Growbots

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Access to over 180 million verified contacts for targeted outreach.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Laser-focused on automating prospecting and outbound processes.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Small business owners will benefit from the ability to consult SDR pros.
    
      
    

### Growbots’s limitations

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Lacks advanced AI functionalities seen in some competitors.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Limited integration options.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Users get charged every time they send an email—so it's not very scalable.
    
      
    

7\. Lusha
---------

![lusha](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F6aO5qYvfqcJrNE7NxZ7M21%2F2cdc366628ecc8efb1546ffefcf26996%2Flusha.png&w=3840&q=75)

Lusha is a B2B sales prospecting platform with many blows and whistles. 

  

At the heart of Lusha's capabilities lies its database of 135 million verified B2B leads. Once you’ve specified your ideal audience with advanced search filters, Lusha searches its database and pinpoints buyers who are most likely to convert.

  

Initially designed as a lead finder, Lusha has expanded its platform to include email engagement functionality. With it, you can reach out to prospects using basic automated email campaigns.

  

### Key features 

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Prospecting filters** range from tracking recent job changes to analyzing companies’ tech stacks and predicting conversion likelihood.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Contact enrichment** adds detailed contact information directly into your CRM or sales tools.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Email engagement tools** automate outreach with targeted email sequences.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Lusha Extension’s contact finder** lets you find contact details directly from LinkedIn profiles and other websites.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Prospecting API** allows you to easily update and enrich large amounts of lead data in your CRM.
    
      
    

### Why choose Lusha

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Fully eliminates the need to search for leads manually.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Claims compliance with the world's highest international privacy standards.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    SDRs mainly favor Lusha for its browser extension, simplifying contact extraction from LinkedIn profiles.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    User-friendly setup and operation, suitable for all experience levels.
    
      
    

### Lusha’s limitations

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Unlike Artisan and Growbots, Lusha lacks email deliverability tools. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    It isn't powered by AI, which also means it doesn’t assist you with email outreach or optimize its prospecting workflows automatically.
    
      
    

8\. Apollo
----------

![Apollo](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4pPN7biEkLmE9Hi6RtmHFb%2F74886ccf12dde0d3054aa2ecdfe379ae%2FApollo.png&w=3840&q=75)

At its core, _much like Artisan, Growbots, and Lusha,_ Apollo features a vast database of verified B2B contacts. What sets Apollo apart is its integration of prospecting tools with end-to-end sales automation capabilities, including deal management and full-funnel automation workflows.

  

Apollo also facilitates cold calls with its built-in click-to-call dialer and conversation intelligence. The platform records phone calls, transcribes them, extracts AI insights, and syncs the data to your CRM.

  

### Key features

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Contact and account search** helps you find ideal leads and companies quickly.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Intent signals** like website engagement, headcount growth, and other custom criteria are monitored to spot when prospects show interest and are ready to engage.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Click-to-call dialing** lets you make cold calls directly within the platform.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Meeting scheduler** syncs with your calendar for easy appointment booking.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Chrome extension** provides quick access to Apollo’s features from LinkedIn, your CRM system, or other cloud software.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Sales performance overview** uncovers insights into your team’s activity, outreach efforts, messaging effectiveness, etc.
    
      
    

### Why choose Apollo

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Lets you connect with prospects both through email outreach and cold calls. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Centralizes outbound and inbound sales strategies within a single platform.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Uses AI for personalized prospect recommendations, data analysis, and email writing.
    
      
    

### Apollo’s limitations

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Apollo’s email engagement suite doesn’t include a warmup feature.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    The wide array of tools may feel confusing, especially if you don’t need all of them.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Help content isn’t comprehensive enough to smoothly navigate Apollo’s functionality.
    
      
    

9\. Close
---------

![close](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F199wxlS7U47Q4b0OfcWqMh%2F7dbcd68106ef639160487966346e773b%2Fclose.png&w=3840&q=75)

Close is a small business CRM solution with dedicated outbound sales tools.

  

With Close, you can create automated workflows with custom follow-up email sequences, cadences, and triggers. It also supports built-in calling features like a power dialer, predictive dialer, call coaching, and recording.

  

The call coaching feature is particularly noteworthy as it allows you to train or assist your sales reps during live calls. You can listen in, whisper advice, or join the call based on the rep’s needs.

  
![Close](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F6EbVNeaovECpnC0tIN9NQ7%2F1633bbd0bc97576562f64ac6bf1a0f93%2Fclose.webp&w=3840&q=75)

### Key features

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Workflow automation** doubles the productivity of SDRs and sales reps with multichannel sequences and automated follow-ups.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **The SMS integration** allows you to send and receive texts directly within the CRM.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Zoom + Close sync** enables automated logging and tracking of your Zoom calls.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Meeting scheduling** helps you book and manage appointments effortlessly.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Team collaboration features** support seamless communication and task management among your sales team.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Call assistant** provides tools for call management, coaching, and recording.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Sales AI** rewrites your emails, summarizes your sales calls, and creates meeting agendas for you.
    
      
    

### Why choose Close

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Multichannel communication tools.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Ideal for SDRs who focus on cold calling.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Designed specifically to meet the needs of small businesses.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Intuitive CRM experience, no matter your level of expertise.
    
      
    

### Close’s limitations

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Doesn’t have a lead database.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    As a small business CRM, it lacks flexibility for custom needs.
    
      
    

10\. Gong
---------

![gong](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F2kY1Tnu8mONlb1BKfCrmDI%2F8019364da2fb745845fc7e99e9d4799c%2Fgong.png&w=3840&q=75)

Gong is a sales intelligence platform designed for mid-sized businesses.

  

Data is Gong's strongest asset. Its AI-driven analytics and extended forecasting functionality make it a top choice for data-driven sales teams. 

  

On top of that, users particularly appreciate the call recording feature with AI follow-ups. The platform records, transcribes, and analyzes every call, then suggests AI-generated emails to follow up with leads.

  

### Key features

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Email engagement tools** help you design, launch, and track email interactions with prospects.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Automated flows** streamline sales activities by recommending the next steps and automatically adjusting your strategy with winning plays.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Call intelligence** assists you during and after calls.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Forecast projections** provide accurate sales forecasts.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **AI tools** power all of Gong’s features. 
    
      
    

### Why choose Gong

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Gong’s predictive forecasting tools greatly assist with goal setting and capacity planning.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Coaching tools for growing teams.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Powerful data analytics capabilities for data-driven teams.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Seamless integrations with third-party systems.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    AI isn’t just a buzzword in Gong. With the Ask Anything feature, you can get quick intelligent answers to any question about your next steps or sales performance.
    
      
    

### Gong’s limitations

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    The extensive functionality comes with a significant cost; Gong is positioned as one of the higher-end options in the market.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Not suitable for small businesses and beginners.
    
      
    

Hand over the routine tasks to your outbound sales tech stack
-------------------------------------------------------------

Finding qualified leads remains the biggest challenge for SDRs. Improve your tech stack with an [AI-powered SDR](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 by Artisan and start hitting your monthly quota.

.

How To Use AI For Sales Prospecting \[+5 Best Tools For 2024\]
==============================================================

Updated On: July 23, 2024

10 minutes read

![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/copy-link.svg)[![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/mail.svg)](mailto:?body=https://www.artisan.co/blog/ai-for-sales-prospecting)

![How To Use AI For Sales Prospecting [+5 Best Tools For 2024](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5EOo0MlsZydfxoyIkKD4Rj%2Fd82f35e3fa6dc6dd416ab8920a139df6%2FArtboard_13.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Introduction
------------

If you’re like most sales reps, you’re coming up against the massive push to integrate AI into all our workflows. And for good reason. AI is a sea of change for automating and optimizing our sales prospecting efforts. 

  

But how does AI impact sales prospecting in clear and practical ways? It's all about creative and tech-savvy people leveraging solutions to make their jobs that much easier.

  

Here, we’re covering the how, the who, and the where of AI in sales prospecting, including our five favorite platforms in 2024. 

  

Understanding AI in Sales Prospecting
-------------------------------------

Sales prospecting is the bread and butter of most sales functions. But modern sales software has a way of radically shifting how we think of traditional practices. 

  

### What is sales prospecting, and how is it important?

Sales prospecting identifies and engages customers (prospects) who could find value in your brand or products. At the heart of this process is the sales pipeline through which you can nurture leads from first contact to final sale. 

  

The steps in this pipeline include:

  

1.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Identifying possible leads** based on your ideal customer profile and research.
    
      
    
2.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Qualifying these leads** to determine if they fit your profiles.
    
      
    
3.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Engaging leads through ongoing marketing efforts**, such as emails, social media outreach, or other approaches. This step could include cool or informative assets like demos, direct meetings, or easily accessible marketing materials.
    
      
    
4.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Nurturing leads** through the pipeline by building relationships through strategic engagement at touch points.
    
      
    
5.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Converting those leads into sales**.
    
      
    

  

The idea of a sales pipeline is essential because it gives you a representation of your sales flow–a critical blueprint to guide strategy, optimization, and forecasting. This helps you create and optimize marketing strategies that speak to those customers. 

  

### How is AI enhancing sales prospecting?

[According to McKinsey](https://www.mckinsey.com/capabilities/quantumblack/our-insights/the-state-of-ai)
, two primary areas where AI has been implemented are product development and marketing/sales. In the latter's case, adoption has more than doubled in the past year. 

  
![Sales Prospecting 2](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4L8q2xoe6ZKdGHPnYGU6WD%2F9abd8d274d1295121b550a0fdc14959d%2FSales_Prospecting_2.webp&w=3840&q=75)

This is where AI revolutionizes prospecting–drawing from the automated and data-driven capabilities of AI to boost core prospecting efforts. Modern salespeople are looking to AI to enhance processes like:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Qualifying leads quickly and accurately.** AI eliminates manual labor in qualifying leads, saving time and improving consistency. Automating the process means that qualification standards are applied consistently across potential candidates, and the best leads rise to the top.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Streamlining outreach without sacrificing quality.** AI can take outreach one step further by applying intelligence to engage customers based on complex behaviors.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Delivering real personalization shaped with data.** Marketers are quickly learning how AI can help them personalize sales outreach with tailored messaging and human-like chatbots.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Using data to drive decisions.** As salespeople, we love our data, but we can’t truly digest all of it on our own. That’s why [73% of professionals](https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/state-of-ai-sales#:~:text=Yet%2C%20when%20we%20look%20at,what%20they%20do%20best:%20selling.)
     see AI helping them pull more insights from their data than they could alone. AI does this while providing a ready source of actionable suggestions based on customer behavioral insights.
    
      
    

  

These enhancements have real-world impacts. [According to a Deloitte report](https://www2.deloitte.com/us/en/pages/about-deloitte/articles/yes-you-can-take-the-guesswork-out-of-lead-gen.html)
, a cloud services company adopting AI into its sales prospect pipeline experienced a 20% increase in pipeline volume. 

  

### What are the benefits of AI in sales prospecting?

With AI, sales teams can improve their processes internally (regarding logistics and productivity) and externally (outreach and messaging).

  
![Sales Prospecting 4](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2Fgxv4bSXg82nP2tk50uocT%2F01e81439e658c85952aaff986bcd2996%2FSales_Prospecting_4.webp&w=3840&q=75)

With AI, you can:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Cut costs in terms of time, money, and resources. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Boost productivity so salespeople can do more with the same resources.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Draw from actual data to brainstorm creative assets like emails, social media posts, and engagement campaigns.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Tailor messaging to discrete audiences effectively.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Improve your ability to map email sequences for outreach and follow-up.
    
      
    

  

**Ready to experience the power of AI-driven outbound?** [Hire our AI BDR Ava](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 and she'll launch a campaign for you within minutes!

  

### The essential AI technologies driving sales prospecting

Marketing and sales platforms that leverage AI are most likely incorporating one or more of these intelligent automation technologies to revamp or streamline one or more processes completely: 

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    If AI is intelligence, **machine learning is the learning foundation on which it is built**. These algorithms rely on historical data and models (language or analytical models) to provide deep insights into particular trends or data sets.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    One area where machine learning contributes is **predictive analytics**, or the use of intelligent algorithms to predict future trends in data. For example, an AI providing predictive analytics can offer hypothetical scores to leads based on existing data to inform where and how marketing pros identify leads. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Gen AI represents a massive step forward in intelligent systems**, and professionals are noticing… [which is why 65% of respondents to a McKinsey survey noted their use of the technology](https://www.mckinsey.com/capabilities/quantumblack/our-insights/the-state-of-ai)
    . Gen AI is perfect for language learning and communication, content generation, and supporting conversational customer interactions.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Modern chatbots** can have fully realized conversations with potential customers and react in real time, providing information or insight that guides the customer from an initial contact towards a more meaningful engagement.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Modern sales and marketing rely on immediacy. **Real-time insights** combine AI's speed and creativity to deliver a better customer experience to the prospect. 
    
      
    

How to Implement AI in Sales Prospecting
----------------------------------------

The notion of “implementing AI” into a process like prospecting might seem daunting for non-specialists. And yet, [68% of sales professionals](https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/state-of-ai-sales)
 predict that most software will already have AI baked in–signaling that maybe sales professionals don’t have to worry too much about accessing the technology because it is already here.  

  

That leaves you with the need to plan, adopt, and optimize your use of AI. 

  

### Steps to integrate AI tools into your sales process

While AI is an exciting tool, it is, after all, just a tool. You must know your ideal customer profile and how AI can help you prospect them. 

  
![Sales Prospecting 13](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5uc3DynIcKvRaieRZcGac5%2F1bb6c5b6b93cf47813adae42ea4a69c1%2FSales_Prospecting_13.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Then, it’s all about finding the right tool for the right job. So, do you need:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)

    ) where AI is baked into the entire prospecting pipeline?

For example, while Artisan provides AI support across the outbound cycle, another platform like Reply.io focuses on automating outreach.

    **Extensive Integrations?** If you’re firmly rooted in a productivity or CRM environment, then it’s imperative for any solution to fit within your workflow. Most businesses fit within this model, but having an entire library of integrations might not be that important for others. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Expert Support and Usability?** How familiar is your team with AI tools? If you want to adapt quickly, you will look for extensive usability, training, and educational resources.
    
      
    

Best Practices for Using AI in Sales
------------------------------------

AI works primarily as a tool, but real expertise is required to make the most of it. That’s where marketers' skills and knowledge can apply best practices and create something truly engaging for their prospects. 

  

### Focus on personalization

Writing personalized emails takes time and energy that could be better spent on strategies or direct engagements with prospects. AI can streamline the process by building emails from pre-existing templates or approaches. 

  
![Sales Prospecting 14](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5fhzev8ttUQ7V2FFGok5fI%2F0eaaf06fbe543ae915bb3ad96d516edd%2FSales_Prospecting_14.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Artisan’s email writing features include proprietary playbooks that address personal connections like shared university backgrounds or offer thought-provoking and relevant industry questions that prompt conversations with prospects. 

  

**Leverage proprietary AI-crafted emails to make your prospecting content powerful and personal in a way that gets responses.** [Try Ava Now](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
.

  

### Make sure to follow up

When, where, and how to follow up with prospects requires data entry, planning, and scheduling hours. But, with AI tools (especially all-in-one solutions), you can automate outreach and follow-ups based on contexts, time-based criteria, or prospect behavior. In Artisan, you can automate three-step email sequences that will stop once that prospect responds. 

  

Automated outreach allows you to focus on being thoughtful and creative rather than managing spreadsheets and calendars–a reality that, [according to Salesforce](https://www.salesforce.com/news/stories/generative-ai-statistics/#h-marketers-believe-generative-ai-will-transform-their-role-but-worry-about-accuracy)
, seven out of ten markets expect to become a reality. 

  

### Optimize, optimize, optimize

Above and beyond all, you should use AI to optimize all outbound materials to capitalize on what works and weed out approaches that down. From calls to emails and social media engagement, AI can help you deliver better information and value to prospects based on real insights. 

  

### Always rely on data

Personalization, follow-up, optimization… These best practices work because you can use data to tailor each to real insights rather than gut feelings or trends. With Artisan’s database of 300M+ B2B contacts, you’re never relying on anything but the best data to inform your decision-making.

How To Use AI For Sales Prospecting \[+5 Best Tools For 2024\]
==============================================================

Updated On: July 23, 2024

10 minutes read

![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/copy-link.svg)[![copy-link](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/mail.svg)](mailto:?body=https://www.artisan.co/blog/ai-for-sales-prospecting)

![How To Use AI For Sales Prospecting [+5 Best Tools For 2024](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F5EOo0MlsZydfxoyIkKD4Rj%2Fd82f35e3fa6dc6dd416ab8920a139df6%2FArtboard_13.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Introduction
------------

If you’re like most sales reps, you’re coming up against the massive push to integrate AI into all our workflows. And for good reason. AI is a sea of change for automating and optimizing our sales prospecting efforts. 

  

But how does AI impact sales prospecting in clear and practical ways? It's all about creative and tech-savvy people leveraging solutions to make their jobs that much easier.

  

Here, we’re covering the how, the who, and the where of AI in sales prospecting, including our five favorite platforms in 2024. 

  

Understanding AI in Sales Prospecting
-------------------------------------

Sales prospecting is the bread and butter of most sales functions. But modern sales software has a way of radically shifting how we think of traditional practices. 

  

### What is sales prospecting, and how is it important?

Sales prospecting identifies and engages customers (prospects) who could find value in your brand or products. At the heart of this process is the sales pipeline through which you can nurture leads from first contact to final sale. 

  

The steps in this pipeline include:

  

1.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Identifying possible leads** based on your ideal customer profile and research.
    
      
    
2.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Qualifying these leads** to determine if they fit your profiles.
    
      
    
3.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Engaging leads through ongoing marketing efforts**, such as emails, social media outreach, or other approaches. This step could include cool or informative assets like demos, direct meetings, or easily accessible marketing materials.
    
      
    
4.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Nurturing leads** through the pipeline by building relationships through strategic engagement at touch points.
    
      
    
5.  ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Converting those leads into sales**.
    
      
    

  

The idea of a sales pipeline is essential because it gives you a representation of your sales flow–a critical blueprint to guide strategy, optimization, and forecasting. This helps you create and optimize marketing strategies that speak to those customers. 

  

### How is AI enhancing sales prospecting?

[According to McKinsey](https://www.mckinsey.com/capabilities/quantumblack/our-insights/the-state-of-ai)
, two primary areas where AI has been implemented are product development and marketing/sales. In the latter's case, adoption has more than doubled in the past year. 

  
![Sales Prospecting 2](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2F4L8q2xoe6ZKdGHPnYGU6WD%2F9abd8d274d1295121b550a0fdc14959d%2FSales_Prospecting_2.webp&w=3840&q=75)

This is where AI revolutionizes prospecting–drawing from the automated and data-driven capabilities of AI to boost core prospecting efforts. Modern salespeople are looking to AI to enhance processes like:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Qualifying leads quickly and accurately.** AI eliminates manual labor in qualifying leads, saving time and improving consistency. Automating the process means that qualification standards are applied consistently across potential candidates, and the best leads rise to the top.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Streamlining outreach without sacrificing quality.** AI can take outreach one step further by applying intelligence to engage customers based on complex behaviors.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Delivering real personalization shaped with data.** Marketers are quickly learning how AI can help them personalize sales outreach with tailored messaging and human-like chatbots.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Using data to drive decisions.** As salespeople, we love our data, but we can’t truly digest all of it on our own. That’s why [73% of professionals](https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/state-of-ai-sales#:~:text=Yet%2C%20when%20we%20look%20at,what%20they%20do%20best:%20selling.)
     see AI helping them pull more insights from their data than they could alone. AI does this while providing a ready source of actionable suggestions based on customer behavioral insights.
    
      
    

  

These enhancements have real-world impacts. [According to a Deloitte report](https://www2.deloitte.com/us/en/pages/about-deloitte/articles/yes-you-can-take-the-guesswork-out-of-lead-gen.html)
, a cloud services company adopting AI into its sales prospect pipeline experienced a 20% increase in pipeline volume. 

  

### What are the benefits of AI in sales prospecting?

With AI, sales teams can improve their processes internally (regarding logistics and productivity) and externally (outreach and messaging).

  
![Sales Prospecting 4](https://www.artisan.co/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fkyprwggh4muz%2Fgxv4bSXg82nP2tk50uocT%2F01e81439e658c85952aaff986bcd2996%2FSales_Prospecting_4.webp&w=3840&q=75)

With AI, you can:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Cut costs in terms of time, money, and resources. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Boost productivity so salespeople can do more with the same resources.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Draw from actual data to brainstorm creative assets like emails, social media posts, and engagement campaigns.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Tailor messaging to discrete audiences effectively.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Improve your ability to map email sequences for outreach and follow-up.
    
      
    

  

**Ready to experience the power of AI-driven outbound?** [Hire our AI BDR Ava](https://www.artisan.co/ai-sales-agent)
 and she'll launch a campaign for you within minutes!

  

### The essential AI technologies driving sales prospecting

Marketing and sales platforms that leverage AI are most likely incorporating one or more of these intelligent automation technologies to revamp or streamline one or more processes completely: 

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    If AI is intelligence, **machine learning is the learning foundation on which it is built**. These algorithms rely on historical data and models (language or analytical models) to provide deep insights into particular trends or data sets.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    One area where machine learning contributes is **predictive analytics**, or the use of intelligent algorithms to predict future trends in data. For example, an AI providing predictive analytics can offer hypothetical scores to leads based on existing data to inform where and how marketing pros identify leads. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Gen AI represents a massive step forward in intelligent systems**, and professionals are noticing… [which is why 65% of respondents to a McKinsey survey noted their use of the technology](https://www.mckinsey.com/capabilities/quantumblack/our-insights/the-state-of-ai)
    . Gen AI is perfect for language learning and communication, content generation, and supporting conversational customer interactions.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Modern chatbots** can have fully realized conversations with potential customers and react in real time, providing information or insight that guides the customer from an initial contact towards a more meaningful engagement.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    Modern sales and marketing rely on immediacy. **Real-time insights** combine AI's speed and creativity to deliver a better customer experience to the prospect. 
    
      
    

How to Implement AI in Sales Prospecting
----------------------------------------

The notion of “implementing AI” into a process like prospecting might seem daunting for non-specialists. And yet, [68% of sales professionals](https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/state-of-ai-sales)
 predict that most software will already have AI baked in–signaling that maybe sales professionals don’t have to worry too much about accessing the technology because it is already here.  

  

That leaves you with the need to plan, adopt, and optimize your use of AI.

For example, while Artisan provides AI support across the outbound cycle, another platform like Reply.io focuses on automating outreach. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Extensive Integrations?** If you’re firmly rooted in a productivity or CRM environment, then it’s imperative for any solution to fit within your workflow. Most businesses fit within this model, but having an entire library of integrations might not be that important for others. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Expert Support and Usability?** How familiar is your team with AI tools? If you want to adapt quickly, you will look for extensive usability, training, and educational resources.

But, with AI tools (especially all-in-one solutions), you can automate outreach and follow-ups based on contexts, time-based criteria, or prospect behavior. In Artisan, you can automate three-step email sequences that will stop once that prospect responds. 

  

Automated outreach allows you to focus on being thoughtful and creative rather than managing spreadsheets and calendars–a reality that, [according to Salesforce](https://www.salesforce.com/news/stories/generative-ai-statistics/#h-marketers-believe-generative-ai-will-transform-their-role-but-worry-about-accuracy)
, seven out of ten markets expect to become a reality. 

  

### Optimize, optimize, optimize

Above and beyond all, you should use AI to optimize all outbound materials to capitalize on what works and weed out approaches that down. From calls to emails and social media engagement, AI can help you deliver better information and value to prospects based on real insights. 

  

### Always rely on data

Personalization, follow-up, optimization… These best practices work because you can use data to tailor each to real insights rather than gut feelings or trends. With Artisan’s database of 300M+ B2B contacts, you’re never relying on anything but the best data to inform your decision-making.

Challenges and Considerations
-----------------------------

Like any other technology, AI sales prospecting tools come with their own set of challenges:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Integrations.** Solutions focusing on integration will typically include the most well-used platforms. For example, Artisan integrates with HubSpot and Salesforce and provides engineering services to support other integrations that our customers need. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Training and Culture.** [39% of marketers don’t know how to use GenAI safely, and 43% claim they don’t know how to get the most value from it](https://www.salesforce.com/news/stories/generative-ai-statistics/#h-marketers-believe-generative-ai-will-transform-their-role-but-worry-about-accuracy)
    . That’s why support and educational services (like those offered by Artisan) are critical to ensuring a smooth transition and adoption phase.
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **Privacy.** Whether you work in healthcare, financial services, or government-adjacent business, your solution must meet industry-specific standards and policies related to security and privacy (such as perimeter security, data obfuscation, or access controls). 
    
      
    

Future Trends in AI Sales Prospecting
-------------------------------------

Sales prospecting is rapidly evolving, and in many ways, it’s impossible to tell where the technology will go. However, there are two directions in which we see innovation taking off:

  

*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **AI Automation.** Sophisticated AI systems will open up automation in an increasing pool of tasks and processes, including more sophisticated insights, integrations, and customer experiences. At some point, it’s unlikely that humans will handle manual tasks related to their pipeline again. 
    
      
    
*   ![](https://www.artisan.co/assets/blogs/list-item.svg)
    
    **AI Employees.** Artisan sees the future of AI prospecting as including AI-powered Sales and Business Development Representatives who can work side-by-side with human professionals to make outreach even quicker and more effective.

**.** Experience next-level outreach and see your pipeline soar.
